hms-directory.title: One Day at a Time
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: What do you do when your memory resets itself each night? Who can you trust? Can you still live a meaningful life? Can you find love? These are the questions plaguing Hermione since her accident and there’s one person with the answers – if only she can remember.

hms-directory.title: Insignificant Other
hms-directory.author: msmerlin
hms-directory.summary: Tired of dealing with the hassle of dating, Harry and Hermione naively decide to turn to one another to fulfill some of their more carnal desires. With a set of carefully selected rules, they vow to not let something as simple as shagging impact their friendship. Fortunately, neither of the Gryffindor's had ever been keen on playing by the rules.

hms-directory.title: Resistance
hms-directory.author: lorien829
hms-directory.summary: The worst has happened. Voldemort has won unprecedented victories on every front, even going to so far as to capture the Boy Who Lived. This story will involve a slightly stormy Harry/Hermione relationship, developing and somehow surviving under the near total devastation of the wizarding world as they know it. Rated R to be on the safe side for later chapters.

hms-directory.title: In The Forest Of Dean
hms-directory.author: T3Tohru
hms-directory.summary: A complete rewrite of Book Seven with a darker and more dangerous outlook on war. Mostly Hermione-centric. Features other character POVs and pairings, but Harmony is the main pairing. That said, this fic is about more than just their relationship. It is a fully developed story about the war, following Hermione and her allies through the fight.

hms-directory.title: Vox Corporis
hms-directory.author: MissAnnThropic
hms-directory.summary: Following the events of the Goblet of Fire, Harry spends the summer with the Grangers, his relationship with Hermione deepens, and he and Hermione become animagi.

hms-directory.title: Strangers On a Train
hms-directory.author: bonded4life
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger is the first person to meet Harry on the Hogwarts Express, not Ron Weasley. How does this change their dynamic? How does this change their relationship with Ron, with everyone? Just how much better could Harry Potter's life have been if a certain bushy-haired witch had wandered into his compartment just a few minutes earlier?

hms-directory.title: Fourteen Days
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: During her work in the Department of Mysteries, Hermione discovers an alternate universe where Neville was the Boy Who Lived, not Harry. Where James and Lily are alive and where Harry and Hermione aren't about to marry Weasleys, but each other. They impersonate the other Harry and Hermione and join Harry's parents on a trip to visit the Seven Wonders of the Magical World. It was only supposed to be two weeks. Fourteen days to get to know his parents. It became a journey of self-discovery. One they weren't ready for.

hms-directory.title: Unlike a Sister
hms-directory.author: madharmony
hms-directory.summary: Nineteen years ago, Harry told Ron he saw Hermione as his sister. Now Hermione is in danger and Harry's feelings for her begin to change dramatically, jeopardizing everything he once knew. A post-war, Epilogue compliant fic.

hms-directory.title: Always There
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: After breaking up with their respective Weasleys and “losing their breakups,” Harry and Hermione find themselves hanging out alone together - a lot. What starts out as friendship soon grows into more as they realize they aren’t the same people they were at Hogwarts.

hms-directory.title: Ades Fidelis
hms-directory.author: HarmoniousConvergence
hms-directory.summary: After saving the wizarding world from Voldemort just a few months before, public opinion has turned against Harry Potter due to his involvement in an extreme act of dark magic. Nearly everyone has deserted him, and he contemplates a dreary holiday alone and isolated, until a certain bushy-haired witch arrives just in time for Christmas Eve.

hms-directory.title: All The Small Things
hms-directory.author: Potato19
hms-directory.summary: Set the summer after OOTP. Hermione gets struck by Dolohov's Curse in the Department of Mysteries and that sparks a change in the relationship between Harry and Hermione. They help each other deal with the grief, finding solace in each other and, eventually, love. Rated M for mentions of child abuse, some swearing and mild adult situations.

hms-directory.title: Blank Space
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter returns to Britain, divorced and a single father. Enter his childhood best friend and first love, Hermione Granger, who’s surprisingly still single. They’re different people now but they both want another chance at their happily ever after.

hms-directory.title: I Need You
hms-directory.author: chem prof
hms-directory.summary: What if Hermione's parents had pulled her out of Hogwarts after she was nearly killed by a basilisk in her second year? How would Harry have managed without her? Years later, she returns and learns about his life in her absence. H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Last Chance
hms-directory.author: LeQuin
hms-directory.summary: Response to Reptillia28's 'Don't Fear the Reaper' challenge. Harry has died for the twelfth time and his reaper sends him back for one last chance at completing his assigned destiny. Find extra deleted scenes by going to the author page.

hms-directory.title: No Hurry At All
hms-directory.author: RobSt
hms-directory.summary: Remus was so shocked at seeing Sirius fall through the veil that Harry had raced past him before the boy's intentions even registered with the werewolf. Screaming 'Sirius!' Harry followed his godfather into the veil before anyone could stop him. H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's Prophecy
hms-directory.author: TomHRichardson
hms-directory.summary: 30th October 1991—the night before the troll attacks Hermione in the lavatory, Hermione hears a prophecy about herself, Harry (the 'true friend'), Ron (the 'false friend') and Dumbledore ('the bearded liar'). Eventual H/Hr. Bashing of Dumbledore and of the three evil Weasleys. Alternate title: For once the adults do their bloody jobs.'

hms-directory.title: Forever Knight
hms-directory.author: DeliverMeFromEve
hms-directory.summary: War, werewolves, wizards, death, the undead… Harry has his work cut out for him. And then there’s Hermione, who’s a different set of vamp-angst altogether. Though war and death has changed so much, Harry knows he could beat the odds of a bitter fate. Now he just has to make her believe it.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's Brilliant Idea
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: A fourth year fic. Harry is stuck in something he doesn't want to be in, Dumbledore's a manipulative bastard, Voldemort wants Harry dead, the school hates him...sounds like every year right? Well this year Hermione has a brilliant idea (or more than one) and her idea(s) change Harry's life, her life, and a big black dog's life too. AU and no idea which genre to put this under.

hms-directory.title: Awakening
hms-directory.author: SweetShireen
hms-directory.summary: After his name came out of the Goblet of Fire, Harry woke to a disturbing reality. The wizarding world only saw him as an expendable pawn, his carefree attitude towards studying left him struggling to survive, and he had never truly appreciated the one, constant companion at his side—Hermione Granger. It was high time for change. Gradual Grey!HHR. Illustrations for each chapter by Arishatistic.

hms-directory.title: Yule Ball Drama
hms-directory.author: FS_VanceMcGill
hms-directory.summary: Who knew Harry asking Hermione to the Yule Ball in Fourth Year would cause so much drama? Especially amongst those whom they thought were their truest friends!

hms-directory.title: A Time For Harmony And Vengeance
hms-directory.author: FS_VanceMcGill
hms-directory.summary: A betrayed and heartbroken 39 year old Harry Potter travels back in time to minutes before the Final Task of the Triwizard Tournament, and merges with his younger self. Harry Potter/Hermione Granger; Sirius/Amelia Parts of this story is inspired by DrT's story “Re-Ordered”, found on ficwad.com.

hms-directory.title: The Boy Who Lived, The Brightest Witch and The Boy Who Wasn't
hms-directory.author: dragonfly117
hms-directory.summary: A single conversation between Hermione and Neville in November of their fourth year changed the course of Harry's friendships forever. Eventual HHr.

hms-directory.title: The Hogwarts Lonely Hearts Club
hms-directory.author: Th3Alchemist
hms-directory.summary: The Triwizard Tournament sparks a surge of international magical co-operation, so when an inter-house Hogwarts penpal scheme is introduced during the Tournament, Harry Potter feels compelled to sign up. What he doesn't expect is that he and his penpal will be the only ones who know just who it is that they are telling their secrets to. Features Ravenclaw!Harry x Gryffindor!Hermione.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Champion's Champion
hms-directory.author: DriftWood1965
hms-directory.summary: Harry allows Ron to compete for him in the tournament. How does he fare? This is a Harry/Hermione story with SERIOUSLY Idiot!Ron Bashing. If that isn't what you like, please read something else. Complete but I do expect to add an alternate ending or two.

hms-directory.title: Too Many Champions
hms-directory.author: maschl
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione decide to help Fred and George to enter their names into the Goblet of Fire. Then, they enter some more names. Chaos ensues. A story that combines humour, logic, canon concepts, and some unique plot bunnies into a 4th-year tale that's hopefully different.

hms-directory.title: I See No Difference
hms-directory.author: maschl
hms-directory.summary: With Professor Snape's hateful and cruel words towards her, Hermione's trust in authority figures comes crashing down for good. She begins to question the adults' response to Harry's forced entry into the Triwizard Tournament and concludes that it's up to her to keep him safe. And if they have to leave the country to escape the madness that is Hogwarts and Magical Britain, so be it.

hms-directory.title: Friendship, Bravery, and Love
hms-directory.author: stellata
hms-directory.summary: On the night Harry's name comes out of the Goblet, Hermione sneaks into his room to affirm her belief in him, and pledge her support to her best friend. Harry realizes that everyone else might turn against him, but Hermione never will. Together, Harry and Hermione navigate the perils of the Triwizard Tournament, discovering along the way that the connection between them may be more than friendship.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger & the Goblet of Fire
hms-directory.author: Coulsdon_Eagle
hms-directory.summary: What if it had been Hermione's name that the Goblet of Fire spat out? A complex spell cast one summer with the most innocent of intentions results in the Brightest Witch of her Age being entered into the Triwizard Tournament. How can she get out of this?

hms-directory.title: Did Somebody Say My Name
hms-directory.author: WhoWhoSevenTwo
hms-directory.summary: Long thought dead, Harry Potter and his very much alive parents are compelled to break cover when his name comes out of the Goblet of Fire for the TWT. Harry finds himself drawn to one particular Gryffindor as he attempts to navigate social, political and magical conundrums…

hms-directory.title: The Cosigner
hms-directory.author: RileyOR
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter wasn't the first person entered into the Triwizard Tournament against his will. In fact, it's happened enough that there are rules in place to discourage such a thing. When Harry finds out that the binding magical contract spoken of so severely isn't actually binding him at all, but rather his mysterious cosigner, he decides to forego participation completely. But more than that, the attitudes displayed by his fellow students, the faculty, and even Albus Dumbledore himself leave him wondering if anyone he knows actually has his best interests at heart. Together with Hermione Granger (with whom he's recently rekindled an estranged friendship) and the tiny aid of an enterprising first-year named Mafalda, Harry's going to do what he does best. Frustrate and enrage a whole lot of people.

hms-directory.title: Night of the Wolf
hms-directory.author: WolfgangNH
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione's summer is the same as usual: Isolation from the magical world. Then events change their lives going into Fourth Year. Wolf calls and blackmarks haunt England and in the protected walls of Hogwarts. Werewolf Harry/Hermione dive into the world of the werewolves. An AU fourth Champion. Dumble Bashing. M rated for all the right reasons.

hms-directory.title: Live Forever
hms-directory.author: Petrificus Somewhatus
hms-directory.summary: The summer after Harry's fourth year would have been much better if just one person in his life had disregarded Professor Dumbledore's instructions to ignore him. And if that person was Hermione Granger? It would have been much, much better.

hms-directory.title: Ravenclaw's Computer
hms-directory.author: kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Harry's discovered the legendary Ravenclaw Diadem in the Room of Requirement and has come to a startling conclusion that it's actually a 10th century magical version of a computer/pensieve. The problem is, it's corrupted by Voldemort's Horcrux. How can he and Hermione Granger get rid of the Horcrux while maintaining the beauty of such a ancient treasure?

hms-directory.title: Baby, It's Cold Outside
hms-directory.author: Potato19
hms-directory.summary: Set during OOTP. The story of how Hermione's innocent suggestion of running a Secret Santa with the DA leads to the ultimate search for the perfect presents, an unexpected change in holiday plans, late-night mistletoe-kisses and revelations of profound feelings hidden deep down. Total HHr.

hms-directory.title: Notebooks and Letters
hms-directory.author: chem prof
hms-directory.summary: The 'true' version of Books 5, 6, and 7, as told by Hermione to her daughter years later, using her old journals and letters between her and Harry.

hms-directory.title: Meeting Requirements
hms-directory.author: Stanrick
hms-directory.summary: Amidst the political turmoil and ubiquitous madness of their fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry and Hermione are about to discover that sometimes in life, in order to find the right way to go you first need to get properly stuck. Apparently.

hms-directory.title: I'm Not The Only One
hms-directory.author: Potato19
hms-directory.summary: AU Fifth-Year. Harry Potter, unseen half-brother to the believed Boy-Who-Lived, Jack Potter; decides that enough is enough, and plans to step out of the shadows and announce himself in a big way. HHr.

hms-directory.title: Siriusly Drunk About Girls
hms-directory.author: Stargon
hms-directory.summary: 'Harry and Sirius end up drunk one night Christmas of fifth year. Harry ends up telling Sirius about the mortifying poem in his second year. Sirius guffaws after hearing Harry recite it and proclaims, ‘I thought Hermione was better with words than that!’' Needless to say Harry has much to think about, and comes to a conclusion by Valentines Day. (full summary inside) - a Prompt Challenge from the H.M.S. Harmony discord channel.

hms-directory.title: Moving Like Beautiful Truth
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Hermione didn't take her eyes off of her otter, feeling an incredible attachment to it as she watched the unmistakable stag approaching her Patronus; the bigger animal stared down, unmoving, before bowing to the little creature, letting it climb to its horns and rest there. Harry’s eyebrows lifted to his hairline. “That’s new.”

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Knight of the Radiant Heart
hms-directory.author: Raven3182
hms-directory.summary: During the battle at the Department of Mysteries something unexpected happens and a knight from a place far, far away suddenly finds himself in the strange world of Harry Potter. How will Harry, as well as the rest of the wizarding world react to having a paladin thrust into their midst? Evil closes in on all sides, yet the Light still shines in the Darkness. Slight AU.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Warrior's Path
hms-directory.author: librarywitch
hms-directory.summary: This is a what if story. Canon will be followed when it fits my story. Harry is powerful but not a superhero, Harry and Hermione the main pairing, rating may change down the road.

hms-directory.title: Never Silence A Lion's Roar
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: AU Order of the Phoenix. After Umbridge exposes the DA, Dumbledore takes the blame and then evades arrest. Left stranded, Harry has no defence when Fudge decides to put him under arrest as an accomplice to a conspiracy against his office. Locked up in Ministry custody, he is left to wait for his trial. He isn't alone at least. Hermione Granger will do anything for those she cares about, especially Harry Potter. He will need her mind to help him fight for his freedom... and maybe even his life.

hms-directory.title: As Long As I Have You
hms-directory.author: Potterhead67
hms-directory.summary: Worried sick over her best friend, Hermione defies Dumbledore’s orders and writes to Harry about what’s going on during the summer while he’s stuck at the Dursleys. This one decision changes everything between them and creates a domino effect that leads to a very different fifth year for Harry and Hermione.

hms-directory.title: A Closing World
hms-directory.author: NicoleHeart25
hms-directory.summary: As Ron, Harry, and Hermione enter their fifth year at Hogwarts, several things change for the worst like the Death Eaters closing in on the ministry more quickly and faster than the original timeline. Harry is outed as a liar, Hermione is subjugated to more things under Professor Umbridge's reign, and Ron learns better in the way he needs to protect his friends and family.

hms-directory.title: Legacy of Merlin
hms-directory.author: Mainsail
hms-directory.summary: If Harry had stopped to think about what was on the other side of the Veil, he wouldn't have guessed it was a tropical beach. Of course, if he had stopped to think, he wouldn't have ended up trapped there in the first place.

hms-directory.title: It Feels Like This
hms-directory.author: possumwrites
hms-directory.summary: Harry has the brilliant idea to make Ron and Ginny jealous by pretending he and Hermione like each other. Just as things start getting confusing, it's clear that a war is impending, and they have to make the choice of what (and who) is most important. All my inspiration came from In The Forest of Dean. <3

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger and the Paradigm Shift
hms-directory.author: PetrificusSomewhatus
hms-directory.summary: We all know that Hermione went to Slughorn's party with Cormac McLaggen to make Ron jealous. But what if she didn't? What if she came to her senses in time and invited Harry instead? As friends of course.

hms-directory.title: Go Together, You Precious Winners All
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: A short canon divergence story inspired by a drabble. Harry chooses to pick a side when Ron and Hermione have their major fallout in their sixth year at Hogwarts. Standing with Hermione has consequences, but being at her side and being a loyal, supporting friend brings him a precious prize as a result. Something more than friendship.

hms-directory.title: Mess is Mine
hms-directory.author: Sisyphus Happy
hms-directory.summary: When Hermione flees Gryffindor tower during Ron and Lavender's snogging, another spontaneous kiss and a fake relationship leave Harry and Hermione wondering how much they're really pretending. Set during HPB. H/HR.

hms-directory.title: Life's Detour
hms-directory.author: KaptainKnuts
hms-directory.summary: One small detour alters the events of Harry's 6th year for him and his friends. When Harry begins to see his female best friend in a new light, it drastically changes and reshapes all the relationships around him and has lasting impacts on the lives of the Golden Trio. 6th Year AU. H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and Half Blood Prince - Harmony Version
hms-directory.author: bt1995
hms-directory.summary: COMPLETED. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out to destroy the Horcruxes and end Voldemort once and for all. Continues on from the canon established in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince - Reworked (Parts 1 and 2). Like my reworking of HBP, I have combined bits of the films and books. I really loved reworking DH and did several drafts to get it to where it is now.

hms-directory.title: The Unreachable
hms-directory.author: Loquatorious
hms-directory.summary: When the scars of Harry's trauma finally take their toll, Hermione takes it upon herself to help her best friend, in any way she can. However, scars can hide terrible secrets, Harry's more than anyone's, and unearthing them reveals the greatest hardship Harry will ever face. The battle for his soul.

hms-directory.title: Hold You Up
hms-directory.author: Potato19
hms-directory.summary: Set during Half-Blood Prince. Ginny is with Dean Thomas, and Ron has just taken up with Lavender Brown. Both left dealing with unreciprocated feelings, Harry and Hermione develop a certain kinship that makes them question their initial takes on school, life and, ultimately, love.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and His True Sixth Year
hms-directory.author: Harry85
hms-directory.summary: Starts after OoTP. Harry is mourning for Sirius' death, when Dumbledore brings him to Grimamuld Place much earlier than the boy expected. There, he finds Hermione, and though the summer they become closer, with her giving him hope about his godfather not being really dead. Follow our beloved pair as they go through a rollercoaster of ancient rituals, new allies, cures to be discovered and traitors to beware of.

hms-directory.title: A Fine Spring Day
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: On a spring day in his 6th year, Harry watches couples in love stroll around the lake at Hogwarts. Harry wants what they have, so he takes a swig of felix felicis so he can claim Ginny as his own. Felix has something else in store for him, though. One-Shot. H/Hr. Pure fluff.

hms-directory.title: Again
hms-directory.author: Amynoelle
hms-directory.summary: Takes place the summer before the sixth year at Hogwarts begins and will continue through into 6th year. Hermione thought she was going on a summer holiday with her family. She had no idea she'd be leaving Hogwarts and her friends behind for good. What will happen to the friendship that could withstand anything? Will distance tear them apart or will it make the heart grow fonder?

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Mysteries of Love
hms-directory.author: Hermiones Twin
hms-directory.summary: The Second War has begun as Harry Potter returns for his sixth year at Hogwarts. More danger and a new mystery awaits Harry and his friends as they discover the past and work to stop a possible future.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger and the Second Law of Golpalott
hms-directory.author: Syzygy_Spirit
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger has a problem — well, three actually. First, there is Ron who behaves like an absolute git and manages to rile her up like never before when he isn't slobbering all over Lavender. Second, Harry's missing, and a part of her would like to believe he did it on purpose to gain attention. Which is probably nonsense, but... well, nobody said she had to be rational about things all the time. But third and most importantly, she appears to be trapped in a time loop and has to live through one of the absolute worst day of the year again and again. Or maybe not?

hms-directory.title: Forever Under the Full Moon
hms-directory.author: Syzygy_Spirit
hms-directory.summary: When the capture of the traitor Pettigrew goes wrong, Hermione becomes infected with lycanthropy. But while some in the Wizarding World would like to see her leave Hogwarts, Harry will do everything in his power to keep her there — and in his life. Because the fight against Voldemort isn't over yet.

hms-directory.title: A Girl Can Be More Important than a Firebolt
hms-directory.author: WolfgangNH
hms-directory.summary: Harry is the top quidditch player, a prefect and the most popular students in Hogwarts. His bane: Hermione Granger. The bossy, annoyingly brilliant.. cute.. girl that has kept him from making top in class for five years. Returning to Sark Island, he won't have to deal with her for two months. Or so he thought... AU. Fluffy. Mature for suggestive themes and language. Minimal bashing.

hms-directory.title: Light of the Heart
hms-directory.author: WolfgangNH
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione head back to Hogwarts. Rivals for the top spot for five years, they are now a couple. As the year goes on, upheavals in the Purebloods and others change their world and Harry starts to take up his role as a leading member of the change. Along the way, the love grows between Harry and Hermione. AU. NO Voldemort or Death Eaters. Normal teens and fluff. Political.

hms-directory.title: Lines Crossed
hms-directory.author: Goldy
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione's relationship is changed forever one night by a kiss. Naturally, Ron's jealous and Harry's confused. Then things get bad. Then things get worse. Sixth-year fic. Now completed.

hms-directory.title: If You Get There Before I Do
hms-directory.author: Continuedinterests
hms-directory.summary: Just what the world needs, another Harry and Hermione fall in love in the tent fic. But! Hopefully this is done with heart and definitely no bashing.   They were a few spots away from the last location they were together with Ron, but it didn't stop Hermione from glancing up at the sound of breaking twigs, or the rustle of leaves, or the quieter whispers of wind. By some animal instinct, every time she glanced up he did too. He couldn't help but think of frightened deer, their ears pert and rotating, eyes focused, alert, listening for wolves. The main difference for them was that they wanted the wolf to come. His glanced away from the empty forest to Hermione's dark eyes, still searching. 'He won't find us.' He used the sharp tone again, he still didn't mean it that way. Her eyes moved to his, injured, her mouth bowed in pain. He felt a stab of remorse. To his surprise she moved closer to him instead of turning away. Their spheres of sadness had been separate the last few days, their moroseness quiet, however loud it felt inside his head.

hms-directory.title: Under The Stars
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: The trio becomes a duo when Ron leaves after The Argument. Lost and stranded, Harry and Hermione make do with what little they have. While together behind canvas walls during a very cold winter, the need for warmth, comfort and hope turns their friendship into something more. On the run, desperate, and trying to complete an impossible mission, they look to each other and embark on their own adventure as they sleep under the stars.

hms-directory.title: Skin And Bones
hms-directory.author: moonwitching
hms-directory.summary: 'You deserved better from him, Harry. And I feel responsible for…for all of it. For coming between you both. I chose you, he was right. But he should have chosen you too.' Hermione and Harry talk after Ron leaves during the Horcrux Hunt, possibly changing their relationship irrevocably. H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Make a Home of Me
hms-directory.author: themidnightguardian
hms-directory.summary: In the wake of Ron abandoning them, Harry and Hermione seek comfort in each other. Featuring bed-sharing, sex for comfort, and softness.

hms-directory.title: Love on the Run
hms-directory.author: msmerlin
hms-directory.summary: After Ron abandons them on the Horcrux hunt, Harry and Hermione turn to each other for comfort, both unable to admit they want something more than just a physical relationship. Afraid to die without really living, they turn to each other to fulfill some very specific goals. When Ron returns will they abandon their new intimacy or double down to get the relationship they both crave? Written for Harmony & Co. Shag-A-Thon.

hms-directory.title: Summer
hms-directory.author: suzy_everdeen31
hms-directory.summary: 'See nothing was strange, he thought as he chanced a glance back at her. It was just Hermione.' Harry and Hermione manage to escape Mrs Weasley's frantic wedding preparations in Deathly Hallows and spend an afternoon together. Or a scene I really wish had been included.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Harmony Version
hms-directory.author: bt1995
hms-directory.summary: COMPLETED Harry, Hermione and Ron set out to destroy the Horcruxes and end Voldemort once and for all. Continues on from the canon established in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince - Reworked (Parts 1 and 2). Like my reworking of HBP, I have combined bits of the films and books. I really loved reworking DH and did several drafts to get it to where it is now.

hms-directory.title: Counterplay
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: What if Harry, Hermione, and Ron were saved from the Snatchers in the 7th book? This is an alternate ending to the series with Harmony, Drinny, and a lot of twists and turns.

hms-directory.title: Til The Very End
hms-directory.author: Potato19
hms-directory.summary: Continuation of the story 'Hold You Up.' Following Dumbledore's death, Harry takes it upon himself to finish what his Headmaster started. With the expertise of his ever-wise girlfriend, Hermione, and his red-headed best friend, Ron; he embarks on the hunt for the Horcruxes, invariably discovering far more than he could have ever dreamed.

hms-directory.title: All Nights
hms-directory.author: Goldy
hms-directory.summary: Set directly post-HBP. Hermione struggles with herself and her feelings for Harry as the trio sets off on their Horcrux hunt. Now completed.

hms-directory.title: Magic Never Dies
hms-directory.author: Lynney
hms-directory.summary: FINAL CHAPTER POSTED Seventh Year Fic. Begins with the end of HBP and carries through the final confrontation with Voldemort.

hms-directory.title: Eighth
hms-directory.author: Lorien829
hms-directory.summary: Begins with Harry's quest for the Horcruxes and the Last Battle with Voldemort. The first defeat of Voldemort has some unimagined and inescapable consequences that continue even after his second defeat. Trying to move from canon, but will end up HHr.

hms-directory.title: The Bottom of the Lake
hms-directory.author: Gabilian
hms-directory.summary: In between the Ministry & Voldemort, Harry searches for horcruxes on the run. Scrimgeour has ideas on how to combat Voldemort, who realizes that he must guard the remaining horcruxes. Harry and Voldemort are destined to meet at the bottom of the lake.

hms-directory.title: A Serpent's Sacrifice
hms-directory.author: Gabilian
hms-directory.summary: The magical world unravels after sixth year. The Order of the Phoenix is an empty shell, so Harry must act independently. Voldemort's lying low, but for how long? Follow Harry as he finds and destroys the other horcruxes and deals with unwanted celebrity.

hms-directory.title: Summer Bliss
hms-directory.author: Harrys Mistress
hms-directory.summary: Harry's having dreams. Dreams that are way too real, just like they always are. The only difference is, Harry finds himself wishing they were real instead of his own fantasy. Set the summer before Harry's 7th year. H/Hr & R/OC.

hms-directory.title: Circle of Friends
hms-directory.author: Amynoelle
hms-directory.summary: Set during the Trio's Seventh Year. Just as Harry and Hermione start to see each other in a new light, a secret relationship between two unlikely people will set into motion an event that will change everyone's lives. Friends will be betrayed and hearts will be broken.

hms-directory.title: Harry's Seventh Year
hms-directory.author: Harrys Mistress
hms-directory.summary: AKA Circle of Friends. Takes place after Harry's sixth year. Other ships, R/Lu & D/G.

hms-directory.title: Love Runs Deep
hms-directory.author: jthorne
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione are hunting Horcruxes. New feelings develop between them. DH orientated, but Non-Canon. Rated MA themes and situations. No Hallows. Updates on Fridays! When this is finished it'll be more of a chronicle than a story. Summary inside.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Hallows of Death
hms-directory.author: merlynthegrey
hms-directory.summary: War changes everyone: Harry resolves to face destiny and struggles to reconcile with Dumbledore's past, fully aware of the price he must pay for victory. Hermione walks through fire, determined to share in Harry's burden. Ron battles resurgent jealousy and soon discovers he may lose far more than he stood to gain. One thing is certain; peace is never cheaply purchased. H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Veritas Quaesitor
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: This story starts at the end of the locket heist at the Ministry. Rather than all three disapparating safely, Harry is pulled out of apparation and stranded. He is arrested and detained in the Ministry, left to wait for whatever fate Voldemort has in store for him. How can the mission continue with Harry in enemy hands? War erupts, battles are fought and Harry finds out what kind of wizard he is. This AU fic leads to an eventual Harry/Hermione pairing. No bashing. ON HIATUS.

hms-directory.title: Lacrimosa
hms-directory.author: ARemedyinWords
hms-directory.summary: Without a shadow of a doubt, Harry knew he was a dead man walking. One could only escape death so many times, particularly when a large target was etched onto one's back. It was unreasonable, unthinkable, that he should love her. She should be with Ron, not him. He would fight this fate until the death. He would fight those urges. He would let her go, because that was what she wanted...wasn't it? [Not your average Soul Bond fic]

hms-directory.title: Shagging Psychology
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9_aka_MistressL
hms-directory.summary: 'Why aren't we shagging each other, 'Mione?' when Harry accidentally asked that question, he expected a slap on the face. Instead, he was rejected through a series of psychological explanations he didn't understand. Hermione Granger may be brilliant, but Harry Potter never gives up. In a battle between science and love, who wins the game in matters of the heart?

hms-directory.title: Can't Pretend
hms-directory.author: WizardWriting
hms-directory.summary: Romance blooms between Head Boy Harry Potter and Head Girl Hermione Granger during their final year at Hogwarts. And what does a dueling tournament, the Quidditch Cup, and Simnel cake have to do with it?

hms-directory.title: The Library: A Harry Potter Fanfiction
hms-directory.author: TheWonderingWizard
hms-directory.summary: Post-War canon divergence. Hogwarts has been rebuilt after the war and the defeat of the Dark Lord. Offered a second chance to finish their schooling and graduate, Harry and Hermione accept. As ever, my standard disclaimer applies. Allons-y!

hms-directory.title: I Hate Everything About You
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: A Harmony take on the movie 10 Things I Hate About You, written for the Sanctuary Discord server's RomCom Fest. Harry snorted. 'We’re talking about Hermione Granger, here. The witch who despises fun. Do you really think I’ll be able to convince her to plan out a ball that has no purpose except, well, to be fun, right before our NEWT exams? There’s no way she’s going to agree.' 'What if you asked her to go to the ball?' Ron suggested. 'Then she'd be more keen on planning it, wouldn't she?' Harry glared at him, refusing to dignify that request with a verbal response. 'Please? For your best mate?' Ron pressed.

hms-directory.title: An Unlikely Date
hms-directory.author: FreakFest
hms-directory.summary: Head boy Harry Potter is told that his best friend Hermione may have feelings for him or she's just a cock blocker.

hms-directory.title: Exhaustion
hms-directory.author: Airen_Thiren
hms-directory.summary: After several consecutive sleepless nights thanks to nightmares and bad memories, Harry struggles to get a good night's rest. Remembering the rare night they would huddle together for warmth in the tent, Hermione offers to share his bed as a last ditch effort to help him. Though both expected it to be a one time thing, a blossoming romance and the comfort they find in sleeping together turn the temporary solution into a pattern of sharing a bed when either of them is exhausted. How long until they stop kidding themselves into thinking they'll ever be able to sleep alone again?

hms-directory.title: Versions of the Truth
hms-directory.author: CelestialSeaWitch
hms-directory.summary: It all started with a silly Charms assignment, Head Boy Harry Potter, and some Peppermint Patties -- everything quickly spiralled out of control after that. Hermione Lestrange was a brilliant witch, but even she couldn't have anticipated how drastically her life was about to turn on its head. Hard AU, everyone!lives, reverse!pure-blood Hermione.

hms-directory.title: Parchment and Vanilla
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9_aka_MistressL
hms-directory.summary: The Halloween after the war, the smell of Parchment and Vanilla awakens Harry Potter's primal instincts to claim what is meant to be his.

hms-directory.title: Wooing Hermione Granger
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9_aka_MistressL
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter wants Hermione Granger to be his girlfriend, that's his goal for their Eighth Year at Hogwarts. There's just one problem - whatever Harry wants, Ron wants it too. So, as part of Operation Wooing Hermione Granger, Harry tricks Ron and feigns interest in another girl. Will Harry win the girl or will this all end in a disaster?

hms-directory.title: Six Ways from Sunday
hms-directory.author: RiverWriter
hms-directory.summary: The war is over and it's finally time for Harry Potter to have a normal year at Hogwarts. He plans to indulge himself with his girlfriend, Hermione, as much as possible.

hms-directory.title: Remedy
author: mgbdeathguy
Myst867
hms-directory.summary: An accident during Auror training sets Harry Potter on the slow realization that he wants to spend the rest of his life helping people - not by arresting dark wizards as an Auror-but by healing and taking care of people. He goes back for his eighth year of Hogwarts and between Quidditch, learning about healing and Headboy duties makes another life-changing realization. The person he wants to take care of the most? Hermione Granger.

hms-directory.title: Flowers for Hermione
hms-directory.author: PkScholar
hms-directory.summary: After the war, the Trio has returned to Hogwarts. Harry has been dating Hermione for a few months, and has been madly in love with her for a lot longer. Problem is, they've been friends for so long that he doesn't know what more to do to show her he loves her. Would a girl like Hermione Granger really go for flowers? Pure fluff, with some humor. COMPLETE!

hms-directory.title: Our Doubled Desires
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: An obsessed Romilda Vane turns to a sinister potion to turn herself into Harry Potter's deepest, darkest desire. Instead of turning into his famed paramore, Ginny Weasley, she takes on the appearance of Hermione Granger. Harry falls for the deception and becomes trapped by his own desire, manipulated for Romilda's gain. She, however, crosses the wrong witch to get what she wants and faces the consequences, but not before exposing Harry's secret. Will his desires cause him to be shunned by the one he loves the most? Or will she accept his darker nature?

hms-directory.title: Outlet
author: La_Matrona
ShayaLonnie
hms-directory.summary: War wounded Harry and Hermione return to Hogwarts for their last year, but there's something wrong with Harry. Hermione makes it her mission to help him find an outlet for his unexpected frustrations only to realise that he has become hers, and they are both way in over their heads.

hms-directory.title: Discipline
hms-directory.author: Myricle
hms-directory.summary: After the battle, Hogwarts needs a new Defence professor. Harry has some time to kill while the Auror office is made ready for new recruits, so he decides to take the job. And if Hermione, returning for her seventh year, finds it patronizing being taught by her best friend, well, he’ll just have to find a way to make it tolerable for both of them.

hms-directory.title: Intertwined
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: Sirius Black arrives first at the Potter residence after Voldemort kills Lily and James and vows to protect Harry no matter what-- even if that means keeping from him the fact that he has a soulmate. Raised by Sirius Harry grows up far more ruthless and strategic and is placed in Slytherin. But even with his godfather's cautions he cannot stay away from the Ravenclaw girl with different colored eyes, a sign she's been given a soulmate by Lady Magic.

hms-directory.title: The Help She Needs
hms-directory.author: damadape
hms-directory.summary: Prompt: (Ravenclaw) Hermione starts falling behind on DADA and it stresses her out beyond belief. She turn to the only person smart enough to tutor them: ( Slytherin ) Harry, who takes immense pleasure in having a hold over Hermione. However, Harry doesn’t do things for free and agrees on tutoring her, only if Hermione accepts to be his Valentine’s date. Harry asked Hermione only because he was annoyed that everyone (in Slytherin), besides him, already had a date. Harry knew that would have only made Hermione angrier towards him, but he couldn’t stop himself because she was kind of cute. They realise feelings in between their studies hours, and Hermione ends up being more happy than angry to go with Harry on a Valentine’s date, where they first kiss.

hms-directory.title: Daughter of Hecate
hms-directory.author: jbirdpuff
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger has heard voices her whole life. Whispers with no source follow her everywhere. At the tender age of four, one of her imaginary friends sends her on a mission to save a little boy who is just as lonely as she is which leads to much more than her first friend: a lost heritage, father figures disguised as Death Eaters, and secrets of Ancient Magic.

hms-directory.title: What Hermione Found
hms-directory.author: Syzygy_Spirit
hms-directory.summary: Head Girl Hermione Granger always has had resented Harry Potter, the bright star of House Slytherin. But when Hogwarts is locked down for a weekend after a gruesome death and mysterious petrifications, she’s forced to spend more time with the Boy-Who-Lived than they’re both comfortable with. And amidst whispers of the Dark Lord rising again the curly-haired Hufflepuff not only finds out that books don’t always tell the whole story, but also that she’s in way over her head…

hms-directory.title: Brilliant, but Scary
hms-directory.author: Free Range Snallygaster
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger is special. She has always known it, really, even before she received her letter. It was too bad that she had never met anyone as special as her, but she was hoping that would change now that she was going to Hogwarts. And she wasn't wrong, because the moment she laid eyes on Harry Potter she just knew he was very special indeed. Obsessive!Hr, Slytherin!HHr.

hms-directory.title: With Strength of Steel Wings
hms-directory.author: AngelaStarCat
hms-directory.summary: A young Harry Potter, abandoned on the streets, is taken in by a man with a mysterious motive. When his new muggle tattoo suddenly animates, he is soon learning forbidden magic and planning to infiltrate the wizarding world on behalf of the 'ordinary' people. But nothing is ever that black and white. (Runes, Blood Magic, Parseltongue, Slytherin!Harry) (SEE NOTE 1st Chapter).

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter: A Year Early
hms-directory.author: Sutiibun Raitobi
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter, soon discover what he is, will be born, and take his place in the magical world a year earlier than in canon. Harry will be independent and break from the hold the Dursleys have on him very early. The story will utilize the concept of Ancient and Noble Houses. Romance far later. No pairings till year 4. Sltyherin, not clueless Harry. Easy, Normal 1st year.

hms-directory.title: The Twisted Path
hms-directory.author: Xetarma
hms-directory.summary: When Minerva McGonagall discovers that Harry Potter's relatives intend to keep him from attending Hogwarts, she takes matters into her own hands. But when Harry comes to Diagon Alley one day early, it sets events into motion that end with him and his friend, Hermione Granger, sorted into Slytherin. Now the two of them must somehow tame the House of the Snakes.

hms-directory.title: All That She Wants
hms-directory.author: Ryoko Blue
hms-directory.summary: **FINISHED** AU reality fic: Harry's in Slytherin, Ron's mean: Hermione asks Harry 'the ladies man' in snaging the man of her dreams, but is he the one she really wants?

hms-directory.title: It Lurks in the Shadows
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger gets caught at the crime scene of Cho Chang's murder with bloody hands and a bitter history with her fellow Ravenclaw, becoming the prime suspect in the eyes of almost everyone at Hogwarts.

hms-directory.title: Whispers in Her Hair
hms-directory.author: Indygodusk
hms-directory.summary: In Slytherin, Harry can become someone powerful and respected. It’s hard to make friends, especially friends in a rival house, but exchanging flying lessons for tutoring is a good excuse. No one needs to know the truth, that Harry’s interest in Gryffindor Hermione Granger starts because of an obsession with her hair and curiosity over her confidence with snakes. Harry makes some mistakes along the way, struggles with pride, and learns that whoever said friendship was easy was almost certainly lying. Once he figures out that easy is irrelevant, he starts taking steps to make sure everyone gets what they deserve.

hms-directory.title: Better Be- Ravenclaw!
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: This story came from the thought that the Weasley introduction was a setup. This is NOT a time-travel story. The premise is that the Dursleys got him there very early and Hermione, being the perfectionist that she is, also arrived very early. Thus they meet and the glory of H/Hr begins. AU For now not a T rating, will probably change in later chapters.

hms-directory.title: Harry McGonagall
hms-directory.author: witowsmp
hms-directory.summary: Professor McGonagall has watched the Dursleys all day and can see what sort of people they are. When Dumbledore leaves Harry on their doorstep and disappears, she takes him away. HHr.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter McGonagall
hms-directory.author: witowsmp
hms-directory.summary: Sequel to Harry McGonagall. Voldemort's back and Harry's true identity is known.

hms-directory.title: Harry Crow
hms-directory.author: RobSt
hms-directory.summary: What will happen when a goblin-raised Harry arrives at Hogwarts. A Harry who has received training, already knows the prophecy and has no scar. With the backing of the goblin nation and Hogwarts herself. Complete.

hms-directory.title: No One Said We Were Supposed To Fall In Love Like This
hms-directory.author: Halliwell19
hms-directory.summary: It has been five years since Harry graduated from Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as Head Boy and top of his class, a testament to the house of Wisdom and Knowledge he was sorted into. After working as an Auror and realizing his father’s career was not the path for him, Harry decides to transfer to the Department of Mysteries to work as an Unspeakable. He gets quite a surprise when he learns that his partner, the person he is to trust and defend above all else in his life, is none other than his former academic rival, Hermione Granger. Will this assignment rekindle the desire that formed between them during school, or will it break his heart even more?

hms-directory.title: Courting Hermione Granger
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger’s return to Britain after years abroad causes a stir in the British Ministry of Magic but it’ll be Harry Potter’s courting overture that will change her life.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Miniature Magical World
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Growing up, Harry's always been fascinated by miniature figurines, buildings, and more. He's even gotten to build a few things here and there whenever he'd saved his pocket money, had been given gifts at Christmas or his birthday, or even from the scavenged bits of things during his wandering around Little Whinging. At the age of seven, he finds a wand left behind by a mysterious stranger in the woods near his home which leads to secrets being revealed. Life will never be the same...

hms-directory.title: The Potioneer's Assistant Rebrewed
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: An updated and improved brew of the original 2017 publishing of The Potioneer's Assistant. While the story is a bit different, the friendships are the same as are the conflicts in the Destiny of one Harry James Potter. AD/RW/DM bash, Somewhat decent Severus Snape, Good Dursleys. Mundane computer science and ancient magic is mixed together to create a cauldron full of adventure and friendship!

hms-directory.title: A Pinch of Salt, A D ash of Magic
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: 'Food has a magical quality of its own' so Harry thought. So what might happen when he finds out that magic is real and that hearts and minds can be adjusted by serving the perfect dish?

hms-directory.title: It's Not Just A Stick: A Wand Crafter's Story
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter was introduced to 'magic' and magic wands earlier than canon by his primary schoolteacher Miss Honeybloom. It was also during that class, he was introduced to and became lifelong friends with a certain Miss Hermione Granger. Armed with a burgeoning knowledge of wandcrafting, an inquisitive best friend and a supportive aunt and uncle; magic awaits!

hms-directory.title: Crafting Magic
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Magic is more than just waving a stick and saying fancy words. Magic is about life and art. Magic is about the people one chooses to interact with. An artistic Harry Potter decides to live up to his last name and begins to craft some wonderful pottery and ceramic creations. At age 11, he discovers that not only is his work magical but so is he!

hms-directory.title: Hufflepuffs and Harmony
hms-directory.author: ap_aelfwine
hms-directory.summary: Andromeda and Ted Tonks wanted a baby, very much, but not then. Fortunately, five years of stasis was an option. In 1991, taking their daughter to King's Cross Station for her Third Year, they meet a distant cousin, Harry Potter. Tonks is delighted to find a cousin who doesn't hate her for having a Muggleborn father. Harry is delighted to find a cousin who doesn't hate him for having magic. And Hermione Granger is delighted to find friends on the Hogwarts Express.

hms-directory.title: Double Back
hms-directory.author: Methos2523
hms-directory.summary: Thrown back in time from 2019 to 1991, a grown and disgruntled Harry Potter finally has the chance to change his life for the better, fixing things before everything went wrong and becoming the father figure for his younger self that he never had. Changing time is difficult though, and the more changes he makes, the less predictable the world turns out to be. Though now maybe he actually has a chance at happiness, both for him and his younger self, and just maybe a chance at romance as well.

hms-directory.title: Aberration
hms-directory.author: cocoartist
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger hates Harry Potter just as much as the next Slytherin. Until she doesn't.

hms-directory.title: Not So Muggleborn
hms-directory.author: grenouille
hms-directory.summary: What would happen if our favourite bookworm were sorted into the Pureblood-dominated House of Snakes? Here's one possibility... Decidedly AU.

hms-directory.title: You're in Love With Her, Idiot
hms-directory.author: natasharomanhoffs
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger has managed to lead a quiet, unassuming life as a fifth-year Ravenclaw. Harry Potter is a well-adjusted and popular fifth-year Gryffindor. What happens when they eventually cross paths? Non-BWL au, Ravenclaw!Hermione, Happy!Harry, HHr, unbeta-ed and please review!

hms-directory.title: Clawing at a Lion's Life
hms-directory.author: PercabethInHarmony
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger has always been a loner. People don't really talk to her. They're scared of her. She's the tough, annoying know-it-all that could destroy you with a flick of her wand. But, now she's sick of her reputation and sick of being alone. That's when Harry Potter sat down in front of her.

hms-directory.title: Switch!
hms-directory.author: angweasley
hms-directory.summary: Hermione agrees to go on a double date with the red haired man she met at her favorite shop and things seem good!... that is to say, until she's introduced to his dark haired best friend who catches her attention. Catches it and keeps it.

hms-directory.title: Curls & Kisses
hms-directory.author: Luxsolis
hms-directory.summary: 'I'm hexing that great sodding oaf! See how he likes me after I shrink his testicles to the size of elderberries.' - A story about kisses, books, and hidden nooks. (Harry/Hermione)

hms-directory.title: Between the Lines
author: A_LoveUnlaced, emmy_award
hms-directory.summary: When Hermione received her Hogwarts letter, she wanted to cry, but didn't.

hms-directory.title: The Case of the Violent Vacua of Vacuity
hms-directory.author: SalTalStudios
hms-directory.summary: The last thing Harry needed before his much deserved holiday was to get paired with the insufferable Hermione Granger on a case for work. And a ridiculous case, at that. If it wasn't for the prospect of getting promoted, he might have thrown in the towel all together. But perhaps things--and people--weren't always what they seemed. Even if they were ridiculous and insufferable. AU, post-Hogwarts, Ravenclaw!Hermione.

hms-directory.title: Love in a Time of War
hms-directory.author: PokePotterfan93
hms-directory.summary: Genderswap GoldenTrio. Harri and Hector are left alone after Veronica storms out of the tent. They talk, and discover what they need to do to ensure both of them need to survive. Requested by ObeliskX.

hms-directory.title: 40 Days
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: Ron left November 15, 1997 and was gone for 40 days. Each day that passes the locket wears down Harry, peeling back his layers, revealing aspects of his personality that Hermione had never before seen. Harry Potter the boy from the cupboard under the stairs was her best friend. She's about to find out there was a monster inside there too.

hms-directory.title: Solitude for Two
hms-directory.author: aTasteOfDarkness
hms-directory.genre: Seventh year. Driven by his anger and jealousy, Ron leaves Harry and Hermione in a fit of temper despite their important mission. But, was leaving his girlfriend and his best friend alone, thoroughly angered by his actions, looking for a way to take revenge, the correct move?

hms-directory.title: The Black Book
hms-directory.author: mosteveryonesmad
hms-directory.summary: The Most Noble and Ancient House of Black's public motto is Toujours Pur, always pure. But it's the private motto that sees Lord Black free his grandson Sirius from Azkaban, that sees Harry Potter raised in the Black ancestral home of Ravenswood, that changes the Wixen world forever: Familia Primum, family first.

hms-directory.title: The Black Book 2
hms-directory.author: mosteveryonesmad
hms-directory.summary: The sequel to the Black Book. The Most Noble and Ancient House of Black is still at war. And now their enemy is ready to strike back. Not only will their way of life be threatened, but also the fate of magic itself. It's time for the Blacks to remember all their lessons...and who they were born to be.

hms-directory.title: Moments in Love
hms-directory.author: Gandalfs_Beard
hms-directory.summary: In his first few weeks at Hogwarts, Harry Potter notices the bushy haired girl from the train struggling to fit in, but he already has a friend. He wants to be her friend too, but he's not sure how to be friends with two people who don't like each other. Harry gives it a go anyway, and his and Hermione's friendship gradually blossoms into something more--something that Voldemort will come to regret. ... First through third year near canon, more AU from fourth year on.

hms-directory.title: The Cupboard Under The Stairs
hms-directory.author: Stargon
hms-directory.summary: A mysterious green inked letter banished Harry from his cupboard. But does taking the boy out of the cupboard also mean that you've taken the cupboard out of the boy? A first year fic book.

hms-directory.title: The Founders' Vault: The Philosopher's/Sorcerer's Stone
author: KarryCoMaster
KarryMaster
hms-directory.summary: A twist in fate has Harry adopted by Lily's American wizard cousin and his family. He comes to Hogwarts an American with his cousin Harper in tow. And they are looking for something the founders left behind. A vault with an unknown treasure in it.

hms-directory.title: A Memoir
hms-directory.author: Taliesin19
hms-directory.summary: 'There are horrors in your past that can haunt you. And they never leave your side because every day of your life is a reminder.' With shaking hands, she placed her quill back into the ink well. Hermione Granger's story, beginning from her 5th year at Hogwarts to adulthood. A story of love that obliterates all obstacles. Will be HHr eventually...

hms-directory.title: The List
hms-directory.author: HermioneCrookshanks919
hms-directory.summary: The List named everyone who thought they were a couple. In other words, all of Hogwarts. Now Harry and Hermione have to prove that they're just friends. The only problem is, even they're starting to wonder if their names belong on The List…

hms-directory.title: Strange Reflections
hms-directory.author: LeQuin
hms-directory.summary: In the aftermath of the Second Blood War its horrors still haunt the survivors, the country needs to be rebuilt and the last thing Harry Potter needed was a family of Potters from another dimension suddenly appearing.

hms-directory.title: Cracks
hms-directory.author: mrsren
hms-directory.summary: The world keeps spinning right beneath his feet. Except it's as if the world was put back together not quite right, and he can't find his footing. Harry finds that the only one can help him is Hermione, and that's an entirely other problem.

hms-directory.title: Thighs and Lows and Highs
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: Harry, Head Boy of Hogwarts following his victory over Voldemort, confiscates a picture of Hermione that she didn't know was being taken at the time, completely and utterly unaware of the feelings it will surface within him. H/Hr. One-Shot. Fluff! Enjoy.

hms-directory.title: Like Father Like Son
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: Harry, just another normal Hogwarts student with no evil whatsoever plaguing his life, really likes Hermione Granger, who won't even give him the time of day. How is he going to win her heart? By being a complete tosser, of course. Boys are idiots.

hms-directory.title: A Collection of Harmonious OneShots
hms-directory.author: Seel'vor
hms-directory.summary: Healer Harry in second story. My contribution to the 'Rampant Plot Bunny' files... H/Hr, rating for language

hms-directory.title: Petrified
hms-directory.author: HermiHugs
hms-directory.summary: My name is Hermione Potter and this is the story of how I with my husband Harry Potter fled our native country Britain and settled in United States of America, to find acceptance, equality and some peace. One Shot, set after second year Basilisk incident.

hms-directory.title: What Friends are For
hms-directory.author: athenaharmony
hms-directory.summary: A rough day at work lands Hermione on a Leaky Cauldron bar stool, something very out-of-character. Knowing that something must be wrong, Harry comes to her rescue. After all, that's what friends are for. Rated T for alcohol references, just to be safe.

hms-directory.title: Snippets from Godric's Hollow
hms-directory.author: athenaharmony
hms-directory.summary: The story of a life in a little house in the sleepy town of Godric's Hollow, told in snippets beginning on a chilly night, when Hermione turns up unexpectedly on the doorstep. If you're looking for bits of sweet fluff and friendship, come in and enjoy!

hms-directory.title: As It Should Be
hms-directory.author: CelestialSeaWitch
hms-directory.summary: Five years post-war, life is going well for the Golden Trio. The Wizarding World is slowly pulling itself back together, the Trio have jobs and lives, and despite the terrible new Minister in place, everything is exactly as it should be. Well, everything will be exactly as it should be thanks to the new marriage law.

hms-directory.title: Healer
hms-directory.author: DarthMittens
hms-directory.summary: 'You are definitely a person worth saving.' Seven words spoken by a stranger standing at the foot of Hermione's hospital bed irrevocably change both of their lives forever. AU. Muggle Hermione. One-Shot.

hms-directory.title: Christmas Miracle
hms-directory.author: ProphecyMarauder45
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter has been pining for his female best friend since they were teenagers. When Hermione Granger decided to study abroad, Harry fears things would change. But as the saying goes, 'distance makes the heart grow fonder.' As Harry plans to surprise Hermione and spend Christmas with her, looks like Hermione has a bigger surprise waiting for him in Paris!

hms-directory.title: Remedy
hms-directory.author: UntoldHarmony
hms-directory.summary: After a raid gone awry, Auror Harry Potter was sent to St. Mungo's bloodied and bruised and seriously injured. Enter Healer Hermione Granger. (post-Hogwarts, AU)

hms-directory.title: A Child Found, A Family Complete
hms-directory.author: AlexandraO
hms-directory.summary: Taking home a child was not how Hermione expected to end her day and adopting...well, that wasn't even on her radar. That is, until a little boy named Matthew up and changes her life. With no hope adopting as a single witch, Harry offers a solution, one she can’t refuse.

hms-directory.title: A Seeker's Guide to Applied Anatomy
hms-directory.author: 23littlebirds
hms-directory.summary: The exam is Monday. The least he can do is help her study.

hms-directory.title: My Cheating Heart
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9
hms-directory.summary: BOOK 1 COMPLETE. Crime and Mystery. Master of Death Story. Hermione stole Harry from Ginny, trapping him in a loveless marriage for a year. When the fruit of her deceit died, she set him free. Ten years later, an epidemic that affects young British witches and wizards calls her back home. She returns and discovers that legally, she is still the Lady Potter. But the question is why? Slow-burn romance.

hms-directory.title: The Bodyguard
hms-directory.author: emmy_award
hms-directory.summary: In which Hermione is Minister for Magic, Harry is Head Auror, and nothing goes according to plan. [c/w for battle scenes, both real and implied violence, graphic injuries, and serious danger] [featuring illustrations by @Ada_Lovelaced].

hms-directory.title: Time Skips, Pain Remains
hms-directory.author: KalKent
hms-directory.summary: A serial killer on the loose driven by pain. A detective on the loose driven by grief. As Auror Harry Potter battles his inner demons and fights to hold on to whatever has left of his once happy existence, a killing spree has forced him back into action and given him purpose. A purpose that will ultimately consume him if he doesn't accept a truth that, time skips, pain remains.

hms-directory.title: oMAYgaverse: harmony
hms-directory.author: harmonious (accidentally_hi)
hms-directory.summary: He was a leader she always trusted and counted on. He had never let her down in their years of friendship. As the new the Head Auror, Harry Potter was entrusted with a new objective for his new role.

hms-directory.title: Falling Twice
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: Hermione wakes up in St Mungo's to find that she's forgotten almost eight years of her life. The last thing she remembers is taking her N.E.W.Ts about to move in with Ron, but she's told that twenty seven year old Hermione is an Auror... and married to her best friend, Harry Potter.

hms-directory.title: The Assistant
hms-directory.author: thesiriuswriter
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter works in the Ministry and is in need of a new assistant. His girlfriend has managed to get rid of all his previous assistants but when Hermione comes to work, Miss Weasley gets a rude shock.

hms-directory.title: Iris
hms-directory.author: suzy_everdeen31
hms-directory.summary: When Hermione left after the battle she never could have predicted it would be for good. Five years later she is pulled back into the magical world in a way that puts her and the people she loves most at great risk.

hms-directory.title: Unraveled
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: Draco struggles to move on after the war. He wondered, sometimes, if his mother knew. If she’d guessed about Hermione. She wouldn’t know it was her, specifically, but he thought sometimes she knew there was…someone in his life. Someone who added a flicker of gold to the grey monotony of his thoughts, a lovely melody to the dull beats of his days. He didn’t know when it had happened, but sometime in the past three years, Hermione Granger had become important to him.

hms-directory.title: Years From Now
hms-directory.author: angweasley
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is the most important person in Harry's life and he is ready to take the next step with her, but he was not anticipating all of the tiny steps along the way.

hms-directory.title: What I Always Wanted
hms-directory.author: Searcy
hms-directory.summary: Eight years after defeating Voldemort Harry Potter has everything he’s ever wanted…a successful career as an Auror…financial security…a comfortable home…good friends and a Dursley free existence. Yes Harry Potter has everything he’s ever wanted. Except a family of his very own. But with the help of a certain brown-eyed witch he just may get that too.

hms-directory.title: Game Theory
hms-directory.author: SallyJAvery
hms-directory.summary: SOUND THE ALARM! CHRISTMAS FIC 2018! It's nearly Christmas, but crime doesn't sleep. Instead, it leaves a swathe of destruction and dead bodies in its wake across Wizarding and Muggle London. Festive! The Aurors are stumped, the Met are mystified, and consulting detective Harry Potter is on the case.

hms-directory.title: Running and Hiding
hms-directory.author: RiverWriter
hms-directory.summary: Hermione couldn't bear to stay in Britain after the war. But she left a wake of questions behind her as well as a best friend who missed her very much. What happens when he eventually decides to track her down in an entirely new environment? Can they renew their friendship? Could it be something more?

hms-directory.title: Thirty Years Later
hms-directory.author: brokenbottleaurora
hms-directory.summary: Thirty years on, Harry Potter is Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement and has enough paperwork to last him for weeks. His wife, however, isn't willing to wait that long. 100% pure Harmony fluff. H/Hr and implied R/L.

hms-directory.title: Hallowed Death Be Denied To Me
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: Auror Captain Harry Potter has a secret. Since he united the three Deathly Hallows, he cannot die. Seven years since he came back to life the first time, he finds himself to not be the only immortal at large in Great Britain. A rogue cult of vampires threatens both muggle and magic lives, forcing the Ministry to drag Harry back into the frontlines. With no choice but to do his duty, Harry not only has to deal with vampires, but with keeping his own immortality a secret. He at least is not alone with Hermione Granger on his side, the only person who knows his secret. She alone knows that he is the Master of Death and she'll do anything to keep him safe from the danger that knowledge could bring him. No matter the cost.

hms-directory.title: you drew stars around my scars
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary:: 'It’s not that bad. I don’t look completely hideous,' Hermione murmured, turning her head sideways and looking at the scars on her arms.' 'You could never look hideous, Hermione,' Harry stated confidently, trying to get the nervous stutter of his heart under control.

hms-directory.title: Soul Thief
hms-directory.author: bartonfink1974
hms-directory.summary: 5 Years after defeating Voldemort, a simple error of judgment leads to catastrophe for Harry Potter. Hermione has to battle to reclaim her dearest friend and Harry must uncover the conspiracy that threatens them all in order to save a once bitter enemy.

hms-directory.title: Semper Fidelis
hms-directory.author: UntoldHarmony
hms-directory.summary: She left years ago after he saved the wizarding world from the hands of Voldemort. She never thought she would be back again... until her son got his letter to Hogwarts.

hms-directory.title: A Darkness So Tender
hms-directory.author: maraudersaffair
hms-directory.summary: Hermione knows something is wrong with Harry. She also knows she's in love with him. When she discovers his vampirism, she is willing to risk her own life to help him. He finds the smell of her blood irresistible, but Hermione is willing to take the chance if it means she can finally have him.

hms-directory.title: Louder Than Her Demons
hms-directory.author: WildflowerWeasley
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is struggling with life after the war. After returning from an extended trip away, she admits to Harry that everything is not alright and that she needs help. Harry is desperate for the girl he loves to be herself again and will do whatever it takes to get her back.

hms-directory.title: even death has a heart
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is dying. Desperate, Harry makes a deal with an unknown man that promises him the power to save her, if only he surrenders his own soul and relinquishes himself to a lifetime of servitude.

hms-directory.title: In the middle of the night
hms-directory.author: Svalewayland
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Greengrass is known for her intellect as well as her unparalleled ability to make a grown wizard tremble on the spot with just a raise of an eyebrow. The formidable witch is nothing if not self-assured. But when she and Potter are sent on an auror mission undercover as a married couple to a small Irish town, she is forced to re-evaluate everything she knows about him... and herself.

hms-directory.title: Engaged
hms-directory.author: RileyOR
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter realizes he has feelings for Hermione Granger. Simple enough, right? Something to cope with, but maybe there's a way to make this work? Except Harry didn't arrive at this conclusion until seconds after she's announced her engagement to Ron Weasley. Forced to cope with this revelation at the worst possible time, what's Harry to do? Started as a rambling comment on reddit, but due to somewhat popular demand, I've decided to flesh it out into a fic. Contains angst, but no bashing. Everyone in the story is a person with feelings, not a caricature.

hms-directory.title: sweetheart
hms-directory.author: thelashjedi
hms-directory.summary: sweetheart (ironic), sweetheart? (confused), sweetheart (derogatory), sweetheart! (terrified), sweetheart (desperate moan). A Harmony fic charting their evolution from close friends to complete estrangement and eventually, lovers...

hms-directory.title: Desperation
hms-directory.author: Maurauve
hms-directory.summary: Harry's a good friend. But when he tells his best friend that he'd do anything for her, he doesn't expect to be offering to father a child with her to save her from the impending Marriage Law.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger and the Theft of Magic
hms-directory.author: Scribbling Steve
hms-directory.summary: (AU) Hermione Granger's dissertation advisor and even her parents think she's crazy to suggest Britain may once have had magic, but a concerned DMLE sees her research as a risk to the Statute of Secrecy and sends a messy-haired, green-eyed Auror to investigate. Her tenacity combined with his fast thinking uncovers a conspiracy…

hms-directory.title: Teacher's Pet
hms-directory.author: Amynoelle and Heaven
hms-directory.summary: After what both Harry Potter and Hermione Granger assume is only a one night stand, they are shocked to see each other at Auror Training- him as the instructor and her as the student. They decide to put what happened behind them and move forward, but will they be able to do that? Lavender Brown also struggles to show that she's not just a pretty face- but when Charlie Weasley shows up, will that put a stop to her plans? Ron Weasley deals with his long distance relationship with Luna Lovegood and pursuing a career path he's not sure will make him happy. Can everyone find a way to be happy, both in their personal and professional lives?

hms-directory.title: Children of Ruin
hms-directory.author: bettertoflee
hms-directory.summary: Eleven years have passed since the Final Battle and Harry’s nightmares have only become more real. When suspicious attacks begin befalling high-ranking Ministry officials, Harry’s focus falls to protecting one person: Hermione Granger, Minister for Magic. Little does he know, their world, and his concern, is about to grow by one.

hms-directory.title: Take Your Shot
hms-directory.author: Frumpologist
hms-directory.summary: Hermione faces the breakdown of her marriage and the start of something else entirely.

hms-directory.title: This Side of Paradise
hms-directory.author: Doodsxd
hms-directory.summary: She didn’t need to think twice. To hell with Williamson. 'You’re hired. You can skip my office and go directly to HR to take your file from the archives. I’ll sign it tomorrow at the latest.' Her decisiveness unveiled reality in front of his eyes. Hermione was not ashamed to enjoy the delight that his shock brought her. 'No one told me you’re the Minis-' 'Everyone probably assumed you knew, since we are both still married to Weasleys.' There was no reason to bring up her divorce, even though she presumed his was not finalized yet, since divorces were public record his hadn’t made the news yet. 'Right.' HIs hand went through his hair, uncomfortable. She resisted the urge to smile at the very Potter-typical gesture. 'So I’m hired. Just like that.' His voice had an incredulous tone to it. Her smile was bright. He had no bloody idea what he was in for. 'Just like that.'

hms-directory.title: The Quidditch Player
hms-directory.author: WizardWriting
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger, a recent transfer from the Ministère des Affaires Magiques de la France, is not a fan of Quidditch. But with the Quidditch World Cup looming closer and closer, her feelings are compromised by the Seeker for the English National Quidditch team, Harry Potter.

hms-directory.title: The Perfect Catch
hms-directory.author: ProphecyMarauder45
hms-directory.summary: AU. Quidditch star Harry Potter doesn't know what hit him when he meets the mysterious Hermione Granger at the Puddlemere Quidditch Stadium after practice. What he does know is he wants her, and this might just be the most important catch of his life.

hms-directory.title: Come Together
hms-directory.author: Granger
hms-directory.summary: It's four years after the Trio has graduated from Hogwarts, and they're about to live together again for the first time. But will old friends remain old friends... or will they become something more?

hms-directory.title: Free Fall
hms-directory.author: Untold Harmony
hms-directory.summary: The last thing Hermione expected when she decided to attend the Quidditch World Cup Final was for a Seeker to fall into her lap. Literally. [Complete / One-Shot, for now.]

hms-directory.title: Steady Glow
hms-directory.author: conjuringghosts
hms-directory.summary: 30 year old DADA Professor Potter struggles to come to terms with his feelings for one of his seventh year students.

hms-directory.title: You Should See The Things We Do (In My Dreams)
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: 'It’s fortunate that Severus and Albus aren’t the only certified Occlumens on the country that you know. Your former Transfiguration Professor is also one, and a Legilimens too. The perfect teacher for you.'

hms-directory.title: Wake with the Sparrows
hms-directory.author: but_seriously
hms-directory.summary: Her new Defense professor is a war hero.

hms-directory.title: Stupid
hms-directory.author: The Seamonkey
hms-directory.summary: DH spoilers. Hermione's wandering train of thought as she washes the dishes. 'Ron will kill me if he sees me cleaning without a wand. You're a witch, act like it! he'd say. He doesn't understand that I need the distraction...' HHr.

hms-directory.title: The Best Defence
hms-directory.author: UntoldHarmony
hms-directory.summary: A solid portion of the students of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry considers the resident Defence Against the Dark Arts professor and his wife to be “goals”. This is why. [One-shot]

hms-directory.title: The Light
hms-directory.author: JazzyGeorgie
hms-directory.summary: All seven Horcurxes are destroyed and Voldemort was defeated two years ago. However, a small band of death eaters claim Ginny and Ron Weasley's lives setting Harry and Hermione into a year of sadness and self-healing. A year after their senseless deaths Harry is still struggling with trying to create a life for himself and realizes he needs Hermione's help. On the flip side, Ron and Ginny are watching, waiting and trying to help the two of them make the best decisions they can, without physically interfering. *This story also has Draco, Ginny and a bit of Ron, in it; they parallel Harry and Hermione.*

hms-directory.title: A Symphony of Thursdays
hms-directory.author: emmy_award
hms-directory.summary: If Hermione had to decide when it was that everything changed, she would have to say it was that rainy, cold Thursday morning in early October, when, at half-past six, there came a heavy pounding at her front door.

hms-directory.title: An Organ of Fire
hms-directory.author: Kristen Elizabeth
