hms-directory.summary: We at Hogwarts wish to extend you an invitation to be our next Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher. PS: It is time to come home, Harry.

hms-directory.title: The Librarian
hms-directory.author: InMyJazzShoes
hms-directory.summary: After taking a stand and leaving Harry and Ron, all Hermione Granger wants is a quiet life away from the Ministry, and so she applies to become the new Hogwarts librarian. The only problem is that Harry applied to work at Hogwarts as well…

hms-directory.title: Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered
hms-directory.author: cheering charm
hms-directory.summary: *FINAL CHAPTER IS POSTED* Hermione lost everyone in the war with Voldemort; her parents, her boyfriend Ron and Harry, who left a week after graduation without a word. Now, five years later he has returned to Hogwarts to rebuild their friendship. Will Hermione forgive him for abandoning her? Will he tell her the real reason he left? How will the wizarding world react to the return of its favorite son?

hms-directory.title: Healing Hermione
hms-directory.author: LeQuin
hms-directory.summary: After Hermione is cursed the only way to cure her is with a risky ritual that ends up having some unexpected consequences. Now Harry and Hermione have to learn to deal with those consequences while they try to find her attacker before he can strike again.

hms-directory.title: The Other Side
hms-directory.author: RiverWriter
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter had never had a true friend. He'’d been to war, to hell and back but he'd survived. And then he found a magical object that transported him to a dimension where a woman who might have been a real friend did exist. The problem was that all she saw when she looked at him was her dead best friend.

hms-directory.title: Stages of Hope
hms-directory.author: kayly silverstorm
hms-directory.summary: Professor Sirius Black, Head of Slytherin house, is confused. Who are these two strangers found at Hogwarts, and why does one of them claim to be the son of Lily Lupin and that git James Potter? Dimension travel AU, no pairings so far. Dark humour.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's Plan
hms-directory.author: chem prof
hms-directory.summary: Post HBP. Hr POV. The shock of Dumbledore’s death plus some unexpected news cause Hermione to reflect on her decisions and actions of the previous year. She resolves to do what she should have done in the first place. Unabashedly HHr.

hms-directory.title: Shadow Walker
hms-directory.author: lorien829
hms-directory.summary: What happened to the Other Hermione that Harry encountered in 'Shadow Walks'? As she struggles to survive, despite immense loss, in a world that no longer has a place for her, how will the reappearance of someone she'd thought she'd never see again change her life completely? Reading 'Shadow Walks' first is advised. Companion piece; alternate universe.

hms-directory.title: Piece by Piece
hms-directory.author: annonymously_blonde
hms-directory.summary: After four years of searching, Harry stumbles upon Hermione Granger in the last place he expected and with a target on her back. Now jaded and cold, Hermione must return to the world she left behind to defeat the latest uprising of dark wizards with help from some old faces. Very dark, angst-filled, and despite the M rating, smutless. Read at your own risk and check the TW.

hms-directory.title: Black and White
hms-directory.author: shuns
hms-directory.summary: When messy-haired, green-eyed Evans Black, the S is silent, met the mysterious but scary curly-haired brunette Jean White on the Melbourne bound airplane, she seemed familiar. Perhaps, his mind playing tricks on him again Thanks Amnesia. Between her emotional support ferret, Murder Kill List of enemies, and magic chopstick wand, she has turned his boring life upside down. Jean has secrets, Evan has questions, the ferret has answers, but nothing is as simple as Black and White. [Confusing tag Draco/Harry. NO Draco/Harry at all.{Draco is actually a transfigured Ferret.} Pure H/Hr.]

hms-directory.title: Divergence
hms-directory.author: Rouch
hms-directory.summary: While the golden trio planned their Gringotts heist, Hermione remembers something from her time at Malfoy Manor that changes her mind about their mission to hunt Horcruxes. Realizing there was another path to victory that might not lead to the death of Harry. She takes matters into her own hands and changes the course of events. Only time will tell if her risks will pay off or if she doomed them all to repeat history.

hms-directory.title: The Haunting of Everly House
hms-directory.author: Rouch
hms-directory.summary: The Everly House has a dark secret. Muggles who enter, don't always exit. These disappearances caught the attention of the Muggle Protection Division of the International Confederation of Wizards. Suspecting magical foul play, Hermione Granger was assigned each case. Year after year, no cause was found until suddenly, the disappearances stopped. Hermione tried to move on, never forgetting about the cold cases. This Halloween, she'll learn the truth.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter & the Soulmate Bond
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Rescued from his Muggle relatives before the age of five, Harry Potter was raised abroad by his adoptive father, Lord Sirius Black. At sixteen, he returns to Britain to attend Hogwarts for his NEWTS and to meet the young witch who he’s known to be his soulmate since he was eight years old. Hermione finds the very foundations of her beliefs rocked when she comes face to face with her Fate in the form of Harry James Potter, the current Earl of Gryffindor. She’s drawn to his magical power and intelligence even as people around them try to interfere. She falls blindly into a relationship she’s emotionally ill-prepared for in the midst of giving up her last connection to the Muggle world and accepting an offer to be adopted by Minerva McGonagall. A fated love awaits them both — if they are brave enough to let magic lead the way.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Full of Grace
hms-directory.author: DeliverMeFromEve
hms-directory.summary: Hermione takes on life after Voldemort with renewed enthusiasm, only to discover that unresolved issues of the heart can’t be forgotten. In her brave quest for a happier future, she meets eccentric wizard billionaire Lysander Athanasius, a suitor who seems to know exactly what she needs, and seems to raise the hackles of her dearest Harry and wayward Ron. NC-17 for LATER chapters. WARNINGS: Fluffiness abounds. Tooth decay imminent. Will not write so much fluff again, I swear.

hms-directory.title: The Eternal Knight (Series)
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter agrees to anchor a Revenant. The consequences ripple out through his life and impact his magical circumstances in ways he never thought possible.

hms-directory.title: Stand by You
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Dumbledore seeks out someone to help Harry Potter with his parselmagic after the events of second year and it changes everything.

hms-directory.title: What Lovers Do
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter finds out the hard way that dirty little secrets don’t stay buried forever when a little souvenir from a liaison in anonymous sex club reveals the identity a submissive he topped for a year. He really should’ve known the moment he put his hands on her. He’s already laid claim to her body; now he has to figure out how to win her heart.

hms-directory.title: Her Secret
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Harry makes a discovery about his wife that changes everything.

hms-directory.title: The Magical Promise
hms-directory.author: Kiera Marcos
hms-directory.summary: She left Britain without a word the day before Harry was set to propose to Ginny. Eight years later, Hermione Granger, prosecutor for the International Magical Court, disappears in the middle of the biggest case of her career and the ICW calls on their most talented investigator and Hit Wizard to find her. Can Harry put aside his own hurt and anger at his oldest and dearest friend enough to find her before it’s too late?

hms-directory.title: Blindness
hms-directory.author: AngelaStarCat
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter is not standing up in his crib when the Killing Curse strikes him, and the cursed scar has far more terrible consequences. But some souls will not be broken by horrible circumstance. Some people won't let the world drag them down. Strong men rise from such beginnings, and powerful gifts can be gained in terrible curses. (HP/HG, Scientist!Harry)

hms-directory.title: Elfish Welfare
hms-directory.author: Tyrannic_Puppy
hms-directory.summary: Halloween 1981 and the Potter family has been attacked. But when Sirius arrives, the crib is empty. Harry is missing, presumed dead, but Mipsy knows the truth. She takes care of little master just as Lord Potter's portrait commands her to. Cover by EnchantedPixie495

hms-directory.title: Lifetimes of July
hms-directory.author: VanderlustWords (MissMonsters2)
hms-directory.summary: Hermione had stumbled into his life on a rainy afternoon. Not unordinary for July, but she was peculiar. And then Harry stumbled back by falling completely for her. From the beginning of time, peace cannot exist without a war, and though Harry won his war, he lost Hermione. Since then, Harry has been waiting many lifetimes for her to stumble into his life again. And when she did, he didn't expect to be fighting another war to keep her again.

hms-directory.title: World Changer
hms-directory.author: Ariel_Riddle
hms-directory.summary: Harry is a man broken and weighed down by regrets. He is past the point of caring, until one day he takes the opportunity to change his fate—blast the consequences. I've jumped through worlds for you, Hermione. You won’t be taken from me again.

hms-directory.title: Angry, Overpowered Harry Potter
hms-directory.author: TomHRichardson
hms-directory.summary: AU. At Harry’s August 1995 trial in front of the Wizengamot for use of underage magic and violating the Statute of Secrecy, Lucius Malfoy and Dolores Umbridge got Harry convicted, and got Harry sentenced to death by Kiss. (“Kind” Dumbledore asked that Harry be “merely” sent to Azkaban for life.) But as the Dementor is drawing close to Harry, something unexpected happens. H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: The Snorkackic Trio
hms-directory.author: TomHRichardson
hms-directory.summary: AU. August 1995, when Harry and Dudley are attacked by Dementors, Luna and Hermione are at the playground too. The girls are too young to legally do magic to help Harry, but they are reliable eyewitnesses, and this makes all the difference afterwards. This summer, Hermione has defied Dumbledore’s orders to not write to Harry. This is an H/Hr story in which both Harry and Hermione befriend the strange blond Seer girl, Luna Lovegood.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Circle's End
hms-directory.author: madscientist
hms-directory.summary: Picks up two weeks after the events of HBP. However reluctantly Harry has inherited a quest that will determine the fate of the world. Rating upped for later chapters.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Unexpected Mother
hms-directory.author: StruggleMuggle
hms-directory.summary: All it takes to make all the difference in the world is for one person to care for another. Baby Harry Potter found caring in the most unexpected of places. Dumbledore/Weasley bashing, Bad Language, Violence, Sex.

hms-directory.title: What We're Fighting For
hms-directory.author: James Spookie
hms-directory.summary: The savior of magical Britain is believed dead until he shows up to fight Death Eaters. Hermione Granger is a very lonely young woman without a single friend until she boards the Hogwarts Express for her sixth year, and her life take a major turn. SERIOUS WARNING. Rated M for a reason. DO NOT READ if easily offended.

hms-directory.title: And Life Goes On
hms-directory.author: sentient_being
hms-directory.summary: After losing everyone he loved in the final battle, Harry Potter is done with this life: all he wants to do is be with the people he cared about. Death begs to differ, and throws him into another universe where his counter part is, to quote Hermione 'the most self-aggrandizing prat ever to grace the halls of Hogwarts'. At least Hermione managed to come with him.

hms-directory.title: The Power of the Press
hms-directory.author: Bobmin356
hms-directory.summary: Forewarned Harry makes his escape from Britain, leaving the tournament in shambles. Protected by family, Harry sets about to fulfill his destiny free from the bigotry and manipulation of others.

hms-directory.title: When Fate Intervened
hms-directory.author: LordVishnu
hms-directory.summary: My first attempt at writing. When Harry's name comes out of the Goblet of Fire Dumbledore gives him a choice. Either participate in the tournament or lose his magic and leave Hogwarts. The Headmaster would never have guessed that Harry would lash out angrily and choose the latter. Minor Ron and Dumbledore bashing at the start. Wizarding War on a quicker timescale than in canon.

hms-directory.title: The Lost Horcrux
hms-directory.author: Th3Alchemist
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter is thought dead, killed at the Battle of Hogwarts. Hermione suffers the horrors of a forced marriage, to a Ron seduced by the lure of power. Trapped in this dystopian nightmare, Hermione's last fading hope is to somehow ask Harry to rescue her on his Deathday. Finally, after 5 years away, a hideously scarred - but beautifully alive - Harry returns to grant her wish.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Darkness before the Dawn
hms-directory.author: madscientist
hms-directory.summary: Sirius Black has fallen, The trio is left dealing with the results of that disasterous night. A destiny has been revealed, and sides have been choosen. The ones that must stop the darkness must first find it in themselves to to step into the light... Let me know what you think. Now completed

hms-directory.title: Bearings
hms-directory.author: MattD12027
hms-directory.summary: After leaving Britain to continue his education, Harry tries to bring the British Wizarding world into the 21st century. Author's note: This was written before the seventh book was published. Character-driven drama with a lot of introspection.

hms-directory.title: Alpha of Alphas
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: Dying the second time, hurt more than the first, and Harry realizes when you're the Master of Death-- the bite of a werewolf is much more than just growing furry once a month- especially when two Werewolf Gods advise him they have 'chosen' him as their new Alpha of Alphas, something they haven't been able to do since a pesky wizard Myrddin bound their reach. Harry's a bit put out at being another chosen anything -- and his vision isn't fixed even though he's been bitten to hell and back and a bloody werewolf? Bollocks! None of that tops the fact that when his best friend, and secret crush, Hermione Granger walks in his new instincts go a bit bonkers and he tents the hospital sheet. Can a werewolf die of embarrassment? Bloody hell.

hms-directory.title: Face to Face with Death (i'll grab his throat)
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Time seemed to slow down as Harry crawled towards the archway, the black veil engulfing Hermione’s body as it disappeared behind it. The last thing he saw was the way her eyes seemed to soften at the sight of him before he lost her to the mysterious artifact.

hms-directory.title: A Just Fight
hms-directory.author: craneyourneck
hms-directory.summary: Hermione learns how to use her power and influence as a war hero. Under her first priority? Muggleborn reparations, werewolf defense, house-elf rights --- and maybe it's more than just one. All along, Harry follows because he knows there is no fight worth fighting for if Hermione Granger is not on his side.

hms-directory.title: You're Feeling That Forever Fall
hms-directory.author: bellairestrella
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger had a special talent for finding a bookshop or library everywhere she went. She could discover them even in the unlikeliest of places. They were a beacon to her, a welcoming space that always felt like home.

hms-directory.title: We Could Live Here Like A Memory
hms-directory.author: bellairestrella
hms-directory.summary: A tale of two best friends in denial, an adorable godson, and the well meaning friends who help bring them together. (And there might be a marriage proposal.) Written for the HMS Harmony Discord Secret Santa Exchange 2021!

hms-directory.title: Awake
hms-directory.author: dirao
hms-directory.summary: Harry wakes up in the Hospital Wing after the Battle of Hogwarts, a year after the battle. It will be up to him and Hermione to figure out where his mind went, what it means, and how it relates to a repentant Draco Malfoy. Shared dreams, teens on the run and dubious wandmaker interference. Post-War, but is war ever really over? (Let's pretend the epilogue never happened, but Draco did toss a wand at Harry during the final battle). All will be revealed, and Harry will often be confused. This story is now COMPLETE!

hms-directory.title: Past Couple, Present Couple
hms-directory.author: LordCroussette
hms-directory.summary: PROMPT: Where James and Lily, and Harry and Hermione, are together in the same timeline. While running away from werewolf Lupin, Harriet (Fem!Harry) and Hermes (Male!Hermione) are suddenly transported back in time after the latter's Time-Turner breaks. Stranded in the past for a week, the two learn to live with Head students James Potter and Lily Evans in their lives while also thinking about their relationship to each other. Genderbent Harry and Hermione!

hms-directory.title: Eating Under the Rain
hms-directory.author: Quiet_Shadow
hms-directory.summary: Only wizards could hope to have a picnic on a rainy day without getting wet themselves; to Henrietta 'Harry' Potter, it made magic worth it.

hms-directory.title: The Girl Who Lived; Legends Never Die (Remastered)
hms-directory.author: AlwaysPeachy
hms-directory.summary: Continuation/Rewrite of the 'The Girl Who Lived; Legends Never Die'. After being dumped from door to door in the middle of the night and passed idly from relative to relative as if she were an unopened, unwanted Christmas present with no tag and no receipt, the only daughter of the late James and Lily Potter was eventually thrust upon a poorly funded and overpopulated orphanage. Surrounded by orphaned children who loathed her for being younger and staff who lived in fear of her ominous abilities, she resigned herself to a meaningless life of misery and regret; one small, irrelevant drop in an uncaring ocean of loneliness and isolation, waiting to be washed ashore and left to silently fade away. That was until she discovered that fate wasn’t quite finished with her yet, as she received a rather strange letter one day. 'Is that...?' She gasped with shock as she inspected the extravagant, flourished letters that swirled in beautiful loops across the front of the perfectly sealed envelope that she held within her small, delicate and suddenly trembling hands. '... is that my name?'

hms-directory.title: After
hms-directory.author: fanpirex (Kingsy)
hms-directory.summary: In a post-war time, Harriet Potter is lost and unsure what to do. Luckily, her best friend Hermes Granger is there to help as usual.

hms-directory.title: Iris Potter and the Goblet of Fire
hms-directory.author: TheOriginalDv
hms-directory.summary: Slytherin fourth year Iris Potter always has to keep her guard up around her house, thankfully she made friends in Pansy Parkinson and Daphne Greengrass, but now her name has come out of the Goblet. Also, she has a crush on Hermione Granger. She might be a Slytherin, but the hat almost put her in Gryffindor for a reason, and if she can face a Dragon she can ask Hermione out!

hms-directory.title: Iris Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
hms-directory.slug: Iris Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
hms-directory.author: TheOriginalDv
hms-directory.summary: Voldemort is back. Lily Evans Potter is back. 'I can't believe he just ran away after that!' Sirius laughed, 'Laying into Dumbledore like that must have been amazing!' 'Oh, it was.' Ivy didn't recognize the voice, but it felt like a woman to her. 'It was glorious!' Another voice exclaimed, was that Iris Potter? I felt so embarrassed!' Another voice added, 'But it was so cool! And a bit gratifying as well, if I must be honest.' 'You loved it, Hermione,' Iris said, 'don't try and deny it, I've only seen you smiling so much after a good snog!' 'IRIS!' The girl Ivy thought was Hermione shouted. 'What?' Iris asked with mirth in her voice. 'Your mum is right there!' 'Yeah, she was also there while we snogged, dear, doesn't get any worse than that, does it?' Ivy heard a groan from Hermione and what sounded like a head hitting the wood of the table, yeah she could recognize that. Sirius reduced Remus to banging his head on the table all the time.

hms-directory.title: Faces of a Mercurial Nature
hms-directory.author: Lyssandra_Med
hms-directory.summary: For the first time in Dorea’s relatively short life, she felt like she was home. Or; Dorea Potter hasn't had much that she can call her own. But now, in a world of magic and intrigue, she can finally find something for herself. Or; young Dorea Potter, metamorph and Girl-Who-Lived, goes to Hogwarts, and (most) of the adults make relatively sane decisions. 11-18-2021 - Complete

hms-directory.title: Black Wings of Glass
hms-directory.author: Lyssandra_Med
hms-directory.summary: 'Absolutely not.' His words were flat, emotionless. He’d already cried out all that he could, wrung himself of every last drop of life. Whatever feelings that he had left were filtered through resigned grief and blackened self-hatred. Dumbledore’s response took on a harsh edge, a knife willing to cut for what it wanted. 'Yes, you can. You will. Or need I remind you of the vow you took?' Or; Severus being a good dad, Harmony being lesbians, and people generally being competent.

hms-directory.title: Of Gardenia and Roses
hms-directory.author: Lestenil
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger asks her best friend Jasmine Potter, who recently came out of the closet, to spend Valentine's Day together to avoid the courtship of Viktor Krum. But Jasmine is in love with Hermione, and decides to use the evening to confess her feelings.

hms-directory.title: Stars Out
hms-directory.author: wynnebat
hms-directory.summary: 'Charlie said that it was taken to a preserve in Ireland, but we should check on it anyway. To make sure it's being taken care of.' Hermione, who has never had an encounter with a dragon in which she hasn't been scared out of her mind, doesn't agree. Harrie's experience with dragons has been much worse than hers, but Harrie's a different kind of Gryffindor. The utterly ridiculous, daredevil kind. 'Go back to sleep, Harrie.' 'But the dragon.'

hms-directory.title: Always and Forever
hms-directory.author: Silancio
hms-directory.summary: The Yule Ball is almost here. While other students are crazy about finding the right partner and attire, he knows with whom he wants to attend the event. | Male Hermione/Harry.

hms-directory.title: A Fair Life
hms-directory.author: Rtnwriter
hms-directory.summary: Harry has died for the twelfth time and his Reaper is NOT happy about it. Given a chance to go back to fourth year and do things again, Harry jumps at the opportunity. But what's this about being a girl! Don't Fear the Reaper with a twist. Fem!Harry. FemSlash.

hms-directory.title: Blood and Magic
hms-directory.author: L0sts0uls
hms-directory.summary: On Samhain night of 1981, the Potter Cottage was attacked by the Dark Lord Voldemort. Charlus and Dorea Potter died protecting their grandchildren, who seemed to have miraculously survived, leaving a young Henry James Potter with a lightning shaped scar on his forehead. Unnoticed by the adults, little Halley Lily Potter was also marked, hers right above her heart in the form of the rune ᛦ (Norse/Younger Futhark for 'Yew'). Dumbledore saw the seemingly dark magic on the girl and proceeded to cut her off from Magical Britain, convincing the Potters that she had no magic and would be happier with the Dursleys. The Potters and all of Britain rejoiced at the apparent death of Voldemort, while a little girl's life would soon be turned into a living hell for 7 long years, until one night, when her world changes for the better.

hms-directory.title: New Life
hms-directory.author: ShadowDog34
hms-directory.summary: During the summer before the trio's last year there are many surprises for Harry. With a shocking discovery and an inheritance that is passed on through each generation. Harry will have a trying summer with jealous girlfriends and devious weasleys.

hms-directory.title: Just Enough
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: A modern day Harry Potter is sent to school armed with a charmed cell phone from his muggleborn mother and the advice from his father that he probably has just enough Veela heritage to recognize the person who is destined to be his partner for life. Its not until 6th year when a transfer student by the name of Hermione Granger makes him think his father may have been right.

hms-directory.title: Love Bites
hms-directory.author: NuncaNiem
hms-directory.summary: It began with a Malfoy with a grudge. But then again, if it were only that, things would have been much simpler. Veela!Harry DEAD

hms-directory.title: A Werewolf and a Veela Walk Into a Pub
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: AU story in which there's a hiccup in the narrative third year. Harry is bit by Lupin trying to protect Hermione. Shortly after that Hermione learns she's a Veela. And their worlds shift as their new identities grow. Grey Dumbledore, AU, Veelaness and lycanthropy, UPDATE- Chapter deleted for rewrite.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and his Veela Mate
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: A Harmony story. Hermione is a Veela and discovers this shortly before their fourth year. What will Hermione's new powers do to alter Harry's fourth year? Warning- there's Ron-bashing ahead. If you dislike Ron-bashing, don't read.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's Change
hms-directory.author: funvince
hms-directory.summary: Stop trying to scare me, Hermione. Only Dementors, Voldemort, and Grawp freak me out, so you can just give up on that ... This is nothing. Get this through your head: I love you and that's not changing.

hms-directory.title: A Requiem in B Negative
hms-directory.author: CrediblyDisavowed
hms-directory.summary: They say she killed eleven students and an Auror, the night she turned. Harry knows that isn’t true. He was there. Aside from him, and the murder of his hopes and dreams, she didn’t hurt a single student. The Auror though? No comment. Now, a decade later, he has finally caught up with her. All that is left to ask, is, by the time the dust settles, what will be left of him?

hms-directory.title: Bound in Blood
hms-directory.author: TalonWillow
hms-directory.summary: When a blood oath is made between young friends, their bond’s implications will surprise both when ten years later, they meet again. Both have been changed almost beyond recognition, but nothing could keep them from each other when love and blood are on the line.

hms-directory.title: Pierced
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: When Harry is bitten by a vampire will he finally learn what the 'Power-He-Knows-Not' really is? M for Violence and Language.

hms-directory.title: Bite Me
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: It all starts because Harry can't stop looking at Hermione's neck.

hms-directory.title: Downfall
hms-directory.author: LordCroussette
hms-directory.summary: A different plan to destroy the Horcruxes during the Battle of Hogwarts leaves Harry open to an attack by a creature, which he wrongly assumes is an untransformed werewolf. A few days later, he looks at his wound only to realize he had the entire thing wrong. This was no werewolf wound. No, this was much worse.

hms-directory.title: The Vampire at Loamly Lane
hms-directory.author: TheSmuttyMuse
hms-directory.summary: When Harry is bitten by a vampire, he turns to the only person he can trust: Hermione. The problem is he finds the smell of her blood irresistible. Can she make the antidote before Harry loses all control?

hms-directory.title: And They Were Roommates
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: As part of the Creature Student Program at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, new students Harry Potter and Hermione Granger—a vampire and a werewolf—learn how to coexist as roommates (and perhaps more) while dealing with their respective conditions.

hms-directory.title: His Angel of Mercy
author: A_LoveUnlaced
FaeOrabel
hms-directory.summary: A smutty, twisted fic loosely based on the legends of Indian Vampires Peymakilir and Pey. After the war, Harry is missing, Hermione is broken, and nothing feels right in the world. Hermione goes on a long hunt to find her love, and what she finds is more than she expected. Will she allow him to help her become more than herself?

hms-directory.title: Turned
hms-directory.author: ShadowDog34
hms-directory.summary: Harry becomes a Werewolf after an attack by Fenrir and his pack. Fenrir, learning something interesting, wants something of Harry's and won't back down with out a fight. H/Hr very minor R/L.

hms-directory.title: Holding a Secret
hms-directory.author: LordCroussette
hms-directory.summary: Hermione has a secret she kept from everyone else: she has spent the last few months working on becoming an Animagus. Why? Because Harry - the boy she love - took a werewolf bite for her and, despite his attempt to convince her otherwise, she knew he is now a werewolf himself. Unwilling to let him endure this ordeal by himself, Hermione decided to follow in the footsteps of James Potter and Sirius Black and became an Animagus. It's quite the surprise for him when Hermione show up in the Shrieking Shack only minutes before the full moon.

hms-directory.title: The Werewolf in Gryffindor Tower
hms-directory.author: Cedar_Forest_Trail
hms-directory.summary: Harry returns to Hogwarts, desperate to keep his lycanthropy hidden. But when Harry's wolf is unable to be controlled by wolfsbane, Harry will go to extreme lengths to keep those he loves safe--even if he loses himself in the process. Please read 'Werewolves in Little Whinging' prior to reading this work. Weekly updates, biweekly when I can manage it.

hms-directory.title: Werewolves in Little Whinging
hms-directory.author: Cedar_Forest_Trail
hms-directory.summary: Dementors didn’t attack Harry in Little Whinging that fateful night. Instead, a far more dangerous creature waited in the shadows, and it will change everything.

hms-directory.title: Weremione
hms-directory.author: Sakubato
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione don't quite escape from Professor Lupin unscathed at the end of third year,which results in unexpected complications and struggles as the pair face adversity and bigotry while trying to stay alive. This is a Work in progress and will be updated as i can.

hms-directory.title: Forget Me Knot
hms-directory.author: Lyssandra_Med
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is losing her mind, and so she's sent to a tiny little village to get it back. She gets it, and more.

hms-directory.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
hms-directory.author: bartonfink1974
hms-directory.summary: Hermione has fought inequality her whole life, but some prejudices run so deep that even defeating Voldemort is not enough to overcome them. The final battle has left Harry and Hermione facing the greatest challenge of their lives, one that tests love and friendships to the limit. This is a slow burn H/Hr story set Post Book Seven, ignoring epilogue.

hms-directory.title: Beauty of a Full Moon
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: 'I do wonder how the magicals of Britain will react when they discover that the 'Boy-Who-Lived' is now the 'Wolf-That-Loves'.' Hermione and Harry become werewolves with some surprising results. So surprising, in fact, that their world turns on its head. Takes place sixth year. Harry/Hermione, AU.

hms-directory.title: Changes
hms-directory.author: Forgive_Me_Severus
hms-directory.summary: Harry loves Ginny… or does he? During the Battle of Hogwarts, Harry is attacked by a werewolf. After the battle is won, a routine medical exam confirms that Harry has been a victim of potion abuse. While the changes brought on by the attack prevent him from being potioned again, Harry starts to recognize other startling truths. For one, Harry realizes that Hermione and Ron’s relationship is not as happy had he once believed. Then, on Halloween, Harry saves Hermione from Ron’s anger and realizes she is his mate. Can two abused souls lean on each other and begin to heal? Can their friendship develop into every lasting love?

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter The Werewolf Of Hogwarts
hms-directory.author: Morrigan_Raven
hms-directory.summary: AU. Harry is turn into a werewolf when he was 8 years old by Fenrir Greyback. When he goes to Hogwarts, he falls in love with Hermione but she is afraid of him, later he starts writing letters to her without signing them. When Ron finds out he takes credit for them and tries to win Hermione.

hms-directory.title: The Abyss Stares Back
author: Aeyliana
notacelestial
hms-directory.summary: Set in an AU where Hermione never attended Hogwarts, Harry falls prey to Voldemort's machinations and to a corrupt Ministry's schemes. Events lead to the Unspeakables examining Harry and they discover that he is a human horcrux. Believing him to be a threat, they contain him and place him in an induced coma. The war against Voldemort rages as Harry sleeps. Desperate, the Ministry turns to obscure and Dark magic as a last resort. In secret, they trade their greatest asset to a sinister sect of demonologists. Harry Potter finally wakes to a world where he is believed to be dead, his life turned upside down, and soon to be forever changed as a creature of both the Dark and the Light.

hms-directory.title: Winter Follows You Around
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: There, on her couch…a dementor was floating above the surface of the cushions, sitting still, though its head was turned towards her direction. Contrary to the creatures she had fought before, this dementor looked almost docile in nature, even cocking its head to the side as it regarded her.

hms-directory.title: Whisper
hms-directory.author: DemaParbat
hms-directory.summary: She walked all the way to the Forbidden Forest every night for five years. Hidden, silent, eager. He was always there, waiting.

hms-directory.title: The Blackbirds
hms-directory.author: RJGriot7
hms-directory.summary: Dumbledore was wrong, Potter was dead. Hogwarts has fallen, Voldemort has won. But the struggle continues. Bloodied but unbroken, a changed Hermione and her fellow survivors still continue to fight an apparently losing war against escalating odds just to survive. Meanwhile, since the battle, Voldemort has grown only more unsettled, frequently disappearing to desperately pursue any possible avenues to greater power, for reasons unknown to his inner circle. However, what neither side knows yet is that after so much has gone so very wrong, sometimes, just sometimes, someone thought lost might just come back again, to put those wrong things right.

hms-directory.title: Orange-Violet Blooms
hms-directory.author: Graziana
hms-directory.summary: It's slower in coming certainly, but then all the best things are.

hms-directory.title: It was just a book
hms-directory.author: Syzygy_Spirit
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione are curious to test something in the Room of Requirement they'd only heard about before—with unintended consequences for both of them.

hms-directory.title: Luter et Cervus
hms-directory.author: Chloe_Parker05
hms-directory.summary: Soulmates exist in the Wizarding World, but are considered a very private matter. As such, they are never discussed in public. Because of this, muggleborns are unaware of their existence. One such muggleborn is Hermione Granger. However, when Hermione comes across a curious book during her eighth year at Hogwarts, she discovers something that might just change her whole life.

hms-directory.title: Spell It Out
hms-directory.author: Allthatissacredandholy
hms-directory.summary: 'At some point while you are growing up, your magic will manifest itself physically. You will get a set of words on your wrist. These words will be specific to your soulmate, the one person your magic knows you are supposed to be with.' Harry/Hermione, Soulmates!AU Side ships: Ron/Luna, Seamus/Dean

hms-directory.title: Harmony Bound
hms-directory.author: flowerchild33
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione soul bond at the end of GoF. AU after. What happens when Harry and Hermione bind at a young age? How will that change their destinies and the path of the war? M for chapter 2 onward. My usual bit of smut mixed into the rest of the story.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and Future's Past
hms-directory.author: DriftWood1965
hms-directory.summary: Starts out the day after the Battle of Hogwarts. Harry and Hermione meet the Goddess of Love, and she offers to let them go back in time. Strictly Harry and Hermione. Minor - well maybe major Ginny, Ron and Dumbledore Bashing. Soul Bond - Time Travel.

hms-directory.title: Came Out of the Darkness
hms-directory.author: COotD
hms-directory.summary: Betrayed by Weasleys, Manipulated by Dumbledore, Saved by Snape. All to win a war, only to lose the battle and die. So Fate steps in and sends them back to try again. Soul bond Harry/Hermione, soulbound Neville/Luna. Starts back in year one. Mix of movieverse and bookverse. Removed some time ago due to muse death -UNFINISHED AND UNUPDATED - sorry, muse has vanished again.

hms-directory.title: I Always Miss You
hms-directory.author: CelestialSeaWitch
hms-directory.summary: Soulmates get the first words said to them on their 17th birthday by their soulmate as a tattoo somewhere on their body.

hms-directory.title: You Do It To Yourself
hms-directory.author: metaphasia
hms-directory.summary: 'Whatever you're thinking, it's not like that at all, Ginny,' Hermione stated. 'I – oh blast it, if I start from when the bond actually happened, it won't make any sense, I'll be telling it all out of order. Let me start at the beginning, Ginny, and please, just wait until you hear the whole story before you come to any conclusions.'

hms-directory.title: A True Thing
hms-directory.author: RiverWriter
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione had always been drawn to each other, but they thought it was simply a product of being best friends. Ron, on the other hand, had suspected there was more to it than that for years.

hms-directory.title: Taking Shape
hms-directory.author: DontStopHerNow
hms-directory.summary: It takes a few years for soulmarks to be completely clear and coherent. Hermione and Harry watch as their marks develop, with varying levels of certainty about who those lines could be.

hms-directory.title: All Things Golden
hms-directory.author: Vofastudum
hms-directory.summary: ​Hermione is Harry's soulmate, but if she doesn't know it, he isn't going to tell her. She's happy with Ron and as long as she's happy, Harry is happy too! Right!?

hms-directory.title: Adorable Violence
hms-directory.author: Cloud Zen
hms-directory.summary: Hermione loves her books. Hermione loves her Harry. Get between Hermione and either at your own peril. Series of connected one-shots.

hms-directory.title: Hugs From Hermione
hms-directory.author: TheOxen
hms-directory.summary: From the second they saw each other, Harry and Hermione knew that there was something special about the other. How will they get through their time at Hogwarts when they can't stand being apart? Harmony, Yandere!Hermione, Fluff, Harry and Hermione against the world.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Lady Thief
hms-directory.author: Starfox5
hms-directory.summary: Alternate Universe. Framed as a thief and expelled from Hogwarts in her second year, her family ruined by debts, many thought they had seen the last of her. But someone saw her potential, as well as a chance for redemption - and Hermione Granger was all too willing to become a lady thief if it meant she could get her revenge.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger is Stupid
hms-directory.author: Ruinus
hms-directory.summary: Set during 6th year, Hermione gets help from two people she least expected and realizes she's in love with the wrong guy.

hms-directory.title: The Way I Need You
hms-directory.author: CrazyKitCat
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is tired of feeling rejected and un-needed by Harry. She is tired of feeling unimportant to her best friend and seeing him on a date with Ginny Weasley may just be her breaking point.

hms-directory.title: He's Mine
hms-directory.author: Romantic Silence
hms-directory.summary: Hermione enjoys the benefits of a Harry shunned by his peers.

hms-directory.title: War Widow
hms-directory.author: sticknsnitches
hms-directory.summary: After the war the Trio has split. Harry's disappeared and Hermione has turned away from magic as a way to deal with being alone. But a new threat reunites old friends, and fans old flames never forgotten.

hms-directory.title: Better Than Revenge
hms-directory.author: mrsren
hms-directory.summary: Harry’s face remained so sincere, but the truth crept not far below the surface. She might know Ron after all these years, but she knew Harry like the lines of her palm. She had studied him—against better judgment.

hms-directory.title: From Friends to Friends With Benefits to..
hms-directory.author: mrsren
hms-directory.summary: They've been best friends forever, friends with benefits for long enough for Hermione to realize she's fallen in love with her best friend. Harry doesn't reciprocate, she's sure of it, but she can't let go of the arrangement they already have by admitting what could ruin everything.

hms-directory.title: Inevitable
hms-directory.author: disenchantedwing
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione have late night realizations at a bar.

hms-directory.title: A Change of Heart
hms-directory.author: disenchantedwing
hms-directory.summary: Ever elusive, a restlessness starts to stir in Harry, and while his life already isn't really where he wants it to be, it's about to get far worse. Ron and Hermione might get back together again, and this time, for some strange reason, Harry finds himself feeling desperate to prevent it at all costs.

hms-directory.title: Touching You, I Catch Midnight
hms-directory.author: glitterwitch1 (jolie_unfiltrd)
hms-directory.summary: Hermione didn't know when it had started, exactly. She suspected the roots were somewhere in her childhood longing for acceptance and the innate feeling of approval that came with doing things correctly, with learning all she could and getting things right, for once. But somewhere along the way, after puberty and hormones and the extrinsic upheaval of their last few years at Hogwarts (including the year on the run which she mostly preferred not to think about at all), it had turned into this: A fucking praise kink.

hms-directory.title: Under the Moonlit Sky
hms-directory.author: arabellawrites
hms-directory.summary: The prophecy demands a child. Harry did not expect to enjoy the process this much.

hms-directory.title: The Minister
hms-directory.author: emmy_award
hms-directory.summary: 'I liked staying close to you, Hermione. That shouldn’t come as a surprise.' A prequel, companion, and sequel to 'The Bodyguard,' all from Harry's point of view. [c/w for battle scenes, both real and implied violence, graphic injuries, and serious danger]

hms-directory.title: Like you never had wings
hms-directory.author: Svalewayland
hms-directory.summary: It was almost sickeningly funny to think of how wrong they’d been, how not everyone had moved forward, how the years had formed and twisted old wounds into stone-cold and bitter resolve. There had been a storm brewing for a long time, they had all seen it coming, she had seen it coming. And it was now here.

hms-directory.title: Living Past the End
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: The War was over and they were safe-- but that wasn't the end. The Trio transitions from war to peace-time and in the process, Harry and Hermione draw closer, finding comfort and understanding-- and maybe something more... *Rating Changed*

hms-directory.title: Portrait of a Marriage
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: A series of fluffy vignettes from Harry and Hermione's married life-- beginning with the REAL 2nd Epilogue to stick into the back of DH. Mostly fluff and smut.

hms-directory.title: Ravenclaws Are Boring
hms-directory.author: Amethyst Jackson
hms-directory.summary: Harry gets a little hot and bothered when Hermione talks to Ravenclaw boys.

hms-directory.title: Never Really Over
hms-directory.author: weestarmeggie
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione return to Hogwarts as head boy and head girl for their eighth year and work out their feelings about what happened in the tent. SMUT (complete) EWE.

hms-directory.title: I'm Not Going To Teach Your Boyfriend How To Dance
hms-directory.author: MissPennyLockhart
hms-directory.summary: What happen's when Harry's jealousy gets the better of him concerning Hermione's new boyfriend.

hms-directory.title: Change
hms-directory.author: Black Knight 03
hms-directory.summary: For Harry and Hermione, change came quickly and unexpectedly. One-shot HP-HG

hms-directory.title: Then Again I Love You
hms-directory.author: goodhumorgal
hms-directory.summary: He lost his chance with her the first time, but how about the second?

hms-directory.title: Three Words
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: Was it possible-- could Hermione possibly outgrow her friendship with Harry and Ron? One-shot.

hms-directory.title: Yule Ball: Redux
hms-directory.author: DarkHeart81
hms-directory.summary: The Yule Ball is announced and everyone, or at least all the girls, seem excited. But what happens when one bushy-haired girl feels like no one likes her? What does the green eyed hero do when he realizes why his friend is upset?

hms-directory.title: If I Don't Tell You Now
hms-directory.author: Kath
hms-directory.summary: Harry's in love with someone he shouldn't be... but does she feel the same? And how will Hermione and Ron react?

hms-directory.title: After the Morning After
hms-directory.author: Kyc639
hms-directory.summary: Waking up next to Hermione after a night he cannot remember, Harry struggles with maintaining the friendship he has always known.

hms-directory.title: Bonded for Life
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: Fourteen Days Prequel. Hermione is struggling to heal from the war. Harry, her best friend and new boyfriend, is trying to help but if she won't tell him the truth – the full extent of what she had to give up to win– they'll never be able to move past it together.

hms-directory.title: Fixing Harry
hms-directory.author: Lynney
hms-directory.summary: Post Voldemort's defeat. Harry's got a bit of a problem. He's finished off Voldemort, and according to the Prophecy he should finally have a life, right? So how come he feels so lost, and why is his magic getting away from him like he's 13 years old and blowing up Aunt Marge again every time Hermione and Ron are around? It was bloody embarrassing, ... and now the Ministry is getting involved. AU.

hms-directory.title: Mane Attraction
hms-directory.author: UntoldHarmony
hms-directory.summary: Harry keeps staring at her and it's driving Hermione crazy. It's not his fault he’s so completely mesmerized by her hair.

hms-directory.title: If it had only been Ginny
hms-directory.author: Indygodusk
hms-directory.summary: If it had only been Ginny, he might’ve tried to save things like decency, morality, and softness. He might’ve tried. But it wasn’t only Ginny. It wasn’t only Ginny the coven had taken and threatened to kill. And it wasn’t Ginny’s cry of pain that had snatched away victory from his grasp and made him go limp and agree to do anything to make them stop forcing that sound from her throat. It was Hermione. (AKA Dark Harry Possessive Trope Trash)

hms-directory.title: And The Ugliness Reared Its Head
hms-directory.author: disoriented_writing
hms-directory.summary: Harry has to do his homework, but it's a bit difficult when his best friend is (not flirting, totally not flirting) having a conversation with (the girl he has a crush on, the girl he's always had a crush on) his other best friend.

hms-directory.title: To Burst and Bleed with Intention
hms-directory.author: AngelinaWeasley1
hms-directory.summary: In order to do what was best for her, Hermione made a drastic life change so she could break free from Harry's obsessive and baneful grasp. What she did not expect was for her last run in with him to result in such a profound consequence, one that might bring her right back into his orbit. [Harmony]

hms-directory.title: I love you like a Love Song
hms-directory.author: Anonymous
hms-directory.summary: An explicit fic following Harry and Hermione careening wildly down their own love story. There will be very little plot, a lot of smut, and emotional exploration. Harry wants control of something in his life, and that something turns into someone- Hermione. Harry goes about this situation in typical Gryffindor fashion, not a lot of thought, but a lot of heart and charging ahead blindly. There may be some triggering content missed by the tagging, please if you are easily riled by a fic give this one a pass, it's dark and sexually explicit. Each chapter title will be pulled from a song I listened to as I wrote this fic! I wonder if all can be recognized?

hms-directory.title: The God of Death: Black Beginning
hms-directory.author: I Am Atrocity
hms-directory.summary: Voldemort kidnapped Harry that fateful Hallowe'en night and raised him up as his assassin. Years later, Harry is sent on a mission that will change the Wizarding World forever. Treachery and ambition go hand-in-hand, and no one is safe. Beset on all sides, Harry must fight to survive and carve his name on the face of history with a legacy of fire and death.. DARK!Harry.

hms-directory.title: The God of Death: Deathsworn
hms-directory.author: I Am Atrocity
hms-directory.summary: The God of Death 2. It has been years since Harry Potter killed Voldemort and brought peace to Britain. But fate isn't finished with him. A new war is brewing and danger is closing in on all sides. Fire and blood are the ink in which the next chapter in Harry's tale will be written as he fights not just for his life but the lives of those he loves. H/Hr, BCjr./LE, NT/GR.

hms-directory.title: Playing by the Rules
hms-directory.author: RobSt
hms-directory.summary: Sometimes playing by the rules is not just your best option, it can be your only option.

hms-directory.title: The End and the Beginning
hms-directory.author: muggledad
hms-directory.summary: My stab at the Harry travels through time genre. Significant inspiration from 'HP & Nightmares of Futures Past' with a twist. Harry/Hermione.

hms-directory.title: From Light to Darkness
hms-directory.author: Christina-Potter-09
hms-directory.summary: Post-DH no ep.Can you avenge evil and not become it? How pain and desperation can turn The Brave Saviour and the Brightest Witch into the worst nightmare for an entire Community? How easily can someone deny the cruel Light for the comforting Darkness?H-Hr.

hms-directory.title: In Too Deep
hms-directory.author: perverted-squirrel
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is the Dark Lords' most prized death eater. But when he sends her on a mission to befriend Harry Potter, her sworn enemy, things don't go quite as planned. When she took the mission she never anticipated falling in love with her target. HHR.

hms-directory.title: They are a breathtakin g force
hms-directory.author: Dratter (Ragdoll_llodgaR)
hms-directory.summary: When Ron wakes up to realize Hermione and Harry had saved Sirius without him he gets angry, he was supposed to be famous, go on adventures with harry, he unexpectedly starts the downfall of the light. Harry and Hermione talk in the night of plans, of revenge, of their future. It was all to easy to get an ally in Snape, a mentor. All too easy to play everyone like the pawns Dumbledore made them. It was all too easy to play into their sick pleasures, and watch as they made Ron's own crumble. All too easy when Ron unknowingly started and ended the downfall of the light. (a dark fic where Hermoine and Harry fall in love and play everyone till the very end where they reveal themselves and all that, no actual smut! small things a little smutty here or there but not anything extravagant)

hms-directory.title: Reap What You Sow
hms-directory.author: TriesHardToWrite
hms-directory.summary: The damaging effects of their fifth year were insurmountable. Harry is now forced to take matters into his own hands with the one person he could always count on, consequences be damned.

hms-directory.title: A Dangerous Game
hms-directory.author: storyofeden
hms-directory.summary: Harry wanted to hurt anyone who had ever looked at her twice. Because Hermione belonged to him. She was so, so fucking innocent, and she was his. His to fuck. His to breed. His to corrupt.

hms-directory.title: Borrower of the Night
author: HeartOfAspen
LightofEvolution
hms-directory.summary: 'I must become a borrower of the night. For a dark hour or twain,' wrote Shakespeare. Hermione is all too familiar with such darkness. But is she really prepared to explore the extent of it in Harry, when she knocks on the door of Number 12 Grimmauld Place on Halloween night?

hms-directory.title: Dark Souls
hms-directory.author: Draco lover forever 1994
hms-directory.summary: Hermione saves Fred's life, and then killed by one of her best friends. She admitted her love for Harry as her last words and then died in Fred's arms. Harry is beyond devastated slowly begins the journey to be dark! Especially when he finds out that M/D/R/G knew they were soulmates and kept them apart. Harry goes back in time to be with her will there will there love survive? Dark.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Nightmare War
hms-directory.author: bipolarmario
hms-directory.summary: 'Behold the yew wand. The wizard who wields it is Death ... and Hell follows with him'. Only Harry and Hermione, and the elusive Power He Knows Not, stand in the way of Voldemort and Total Victory against the heart of Magic itself. Post HBP AU [Dark themes]

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger and the Marriage Law Revolution
hms-directory.author: Starfox5
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger deals with the marriage law the Wizengamot passed after Voldemort's defeat - in the style of the French Revolution. Old scores are settled but new enemies gather their forces, determined to crush the new British Ministry.

hms-directory.title: For Lack of a Bezoar
hms-directory.author: BolshevikMuppet99
hms-directory.summary: Canon Divergence from HBP. When Harry fails to save Ron's life in Slughorn's office, he and Hermione are thrust into a search for answers. But the path is thornier than either of them could have possibly imagined.

hms-directory.title: Dirty Little Witch
hms-directory.author: Azrael38
hms-directory.summary: It's the summer after 5th year and Harry is not a happy camper. With his godfather dead, Harry has nobody left to turn to. Except one. One who has been with him since the beginning...

hms-directory.title: The Destroyer
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: The war has ended but nothing has changed. Harry Potter can't help but think, he could - easily- take over Wizarding Britain. The only thing stopping him? Hermione Granger.

hms-directory.title: The Making of a Couple
hms-directory.author: Lilbit903
hms-directory.summary: Inspired by this prompt: Harry is the most infuriating little worm she's ever known. Now if she wasn't so damn attracted to him, Hermione would be just fine. AU where Hermione hates Harry but can't seem to stop herself from falling for him.

hms-directory.title: Our Nameless Will
hms-directory.author: VipyGirl831
hms-directory.summary: When Harry Potter becomes a captive of Voldemort, he does not expect to meet Hermione Granger, a Death Eater who will turn his world upside down. Based off of the “Death Eater Hermione” challenge by Harry85.

hms-directory.title: Stranded
hms-directory.author: Starfox5
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter and Hermione Granger. The star Seeker and the swotty muggleborn have been at each other's throats since their first year at Hogwarts. Their feud has cost Gryffindor more points than the Weasley twins and has now resulted in the two of them being stranded on a deserted island.

hms-directory.title: The Order and The Crown
hms-directory.author: Frumpologist
hms-directory.summary: Hermione dedicates her life to The Crown - the people who trained her to become an assassin after her parents were killed. Harry Potter is her next mark, but little does she know how much her life is going to change after she spends one night with him. Enchanted Awards 2019, Runner Up: Best Kick-Ass Hermione.

hms-directory.title: I'll Cut Your Throat
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: What do you do when you've got a knife held to Harry Potter's throat? Inspired by this amazing artwork: https://archiveofourown.org/collections/HMS_Harmony_MAYhem/works/38931204

hms-directory.title: Crossroads
hms-directory.author: raydarkwolf
hms-directory.summary: She was a hit witch. He was an outlaw. She enforced the Ministry's orders and he fought against it. Perhaps it was fate that ordained two people so powerful couldn't walk the same path. But it wasn't fate that kept pulling them back to each other—it was hunger. A mini Harmony comic! Fully colored.

hms-directory.title: Here Again
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: After breaking up and spending two years apart, Harry and Hermione are brought back together by preparations for Ron and Luna's wedding. The tension between them is unbearable, the unsaid words suffocating, and though they've lost the ability to communicate, they're both thinking the same thing: What happened to us? How did I get here again? I feel like I traversed the entire planet and ended up right back where I started, in his arms. It's exasperating but also... okay. Like coming home. A home I never should have left in the first place.

hms-directory.title: So Here We Are
hms-directory.author: Anjie
hms-directory.summary: Harry & Hermione used to be the best of friends growing up until one event changed everything. Now they hate each other with a passion. Will they ever become friends again and will they ever realize how much they truly love each other? AU fic.

hms-directory.title: Taking the Leap
hms-directory.author: TLM8
hms-directory.summary: One disastrous breakup was all it took to convince Hermione dating your best friend was a terrible idea. So why is she having such a hard time staying out of her other best friend's bed? Her mind already knows its a mistake. If only she could get her heart on board too.

hms-directory.title: Sooner Or Later
hms-directory.author: Potato19
hms-directory.summary: Post-Hogwarts. One year after the Victory over Voldemort, Hermione Granger is finally graduating and Harry Potter is worryingly restless. What follows is a summer of mutual attraction, new discoveries and a misplaced 'friends with benefits' deal that will alter the most important relationship that they have.

hms-directory.title: Best Friends With Benefits
hms-directory.author: Christina-Potter-09
hms-directory.summary: Post-DH No-Epilogue. Harry and Hermione are great friends, the best of friends... what happens when they decide to give their friendship some benefits? It's a good idea until it becomes a bad idea and it becomes bad really, really fast…hhr please r&r.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's Perfume
hms-directory.author: rileyriddle
hms-directory.summary: Ron thought he saw something between Harry and Hermione that night. An alternate version of the perfume & snatchers scene. Ron follows the pair and overhears what he'd hoped wasn't true.

hms-directory.title: There's a Crown, Covered in Glitter and Gold
hms-directory.author: MissELY
hms-directory.summary: A mysterious object is uncovered in the depths of the Ministry, causing chaos and concern. Desperate for a change, a challenge, and a better way to pay for the care of her ailing mother, Hermione agrees to work for the Ministry on solving that mystery. This sets her on a path towards the recently returned Harry Potter, who is trying to root out corruption in a deeply flawed system, towards her old Hogwarts bullies who are longing to see her fail, and towards a crown, that she will wear, whether they like it or not.

hms-directory.title: Academic Curiosity
hms-directory.author: natasharomanhoffs
hms-directory.summary: Harry's curiosity gets the best of him and it puts him in a bind. Hermione lends a helping hand.

hms-directory.title: Incarcerous
author: La_Matrona
ShayaLonnie
hms-directory.summary: With the war long behind them and their lives ever moving forward, Harry and Hermione have learnt to cope with their wounds, but when balancing parenthood, careers, and their relationship proves more difficult than they'd anticipated, they're quickly reminded that simply coping may not be enough.

hms-directory.title: Again Please
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger decides to tie down Harry Potter to her bed.

hms-directory.title: Ongoing Experimentation
hms-directory.author: ghanima77
hms-directory.summary: A sequel to A Demonstration of Skill. Harry and Hermione have been in love with each other for years, but the timing was never right. Assuming it just wasn’t meant to be, they kept their feelings hidden from each other. That was until a night of drinking turned into a whole lot more. Now they are ready to confess their desires and make a proper go of it. Come along as they explore their feelings for each other and their sexuality together. Lemony goodness awaits.

hms-directory.title: An Unexpected Valentine
hms-directory.author: TheSmuttyMuse
hms-directory.summary: Harry has made a mess of it. The day before Valentines he tells his girlfriend, Hermione Granger, that their sex life is getting stale and predictable. And now he returns to an empty home and wonders if his relationship is over. He's so distracted he never even sees the stunning spell coming.

hms-directory.title: An Alternate Study Method
author: LisFleur
milordrevan
hms-directory.summary: Wanting to help Harry study for his O.W.L.'s, Hermione finds an unusual but reportedly effective approach to studying. She tests this with Harry, and they both find it very compelling.

hms-directory.title: A Demonstration of Skill
hms-directory.author: ghanima77
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione stray onto a topic of conversation that perhaps they shouldn’t have. It doesn’t take long before challenges are made and demonstrations are needed.

hms-directory.title: Relinquish Control
hms-directory.author: LilithShade
hms-directory.summary: Years had passed since the Second Wizarding War, yet the scars of Harry's past ran deep. Not only those of the body, but of the mind too. His youth had been burdened with the oppressing weight of unreasonable responsibility, now – with that past behind him – he craved nothing more than to relinquish control to someone he trusted implicitly.

hms-directory.title: Puppy
hms-directory.author: DeviantHufflepuff
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione love to spice it up in the bedroom. When Hermione catches Harry watching a specific type of porn, she is more than happy to explore this new kink with him.

hms-directory.title: Slowly, My Good Boy
hms-directory.author: DeviantHufflepuff
hms-directory.summary: Hermione needs to teach her boyfriend a lesson or two.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and The Dark Queen
hms-directory.author: StruggleMuggle
hms-directory.summary: Twelve years after the Battle of Hogwarts, Harry faces his ultimate adversary.

hms-directory.title: The Shoot
hms-directory.author: green__eyes
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger has received an assignment: a photographic study of the human form. In other words, a boudoir photoshoot... and she needs to find a model. The only person she feels comfortable asking is her best friend and long-time housemate, Harry Potter. Yet she's been hesitating, for fear that it might reawaken feelings for him that she thought she'd long since buried...

hms-directory.title: Of Partridges and Pear Trees
hms-directory.author: AvaJune
hms-directory.summary: ‘She’s my sister in everything but blood.’ That’s what he’d been telling anyone who had asked him about Hermione all through school and for all 8 years after the war. He’d believed it when he said it, too. How unfortunate for Harry, then, that he now realized he was fiercely and irrevocably in love with her. Harmony & Co (18+) Advent Fest: Day 2

hms-directory.title: I'll Do You, You Do Me
hms-directory.author: AlexandraO
hms-directory.summary: Curious to what it would be like, Harry and Hermione explore a kink, one with a potion they have both taken before. Sometimes it’s good to switch things up but needless to say, Professor Snape would not be impressed with their latest adventure.

hms-directory.title: New Positions
hms-directory.author: StarksDeservedBetter (orphan_account)
hms-directory.summary: Having had some time away from the wizarding world, Harry Potter takes up a job offer to teach Defence Against the Dark Arts at Hogwarts. The last person he expects to come across is Hermione Granger, who is also a first year teacher and his close friend. Fate seems to have thrown the newly single friends together, so what will happen when they’re both left alone at Hogwarts together, with nothing to do but plan curriculum and explore a totally empty castle?

hms-directory.title: She's The Angel (of small death)
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Watching Hermione take charge in a courtroom was the hottest thing Harry had ever seen, and it led to very fun and naughty happenings inside of her office.

hms-directory.title: Together We’re Harmony
hms-directory.author: Magical_Worlds
hms-directory.summary: They had always been so very different, and yet so similar. Drawn closer by the strings of destiny, they were fated to be together, no matter how much they tried to deny it. Their relationship, forged and strengthened in the fires of war and loss, now had one final test to overcome.  Their own traumas, the end of a war, and the sudden loss of purpose.  And yet, in the midst of all this, they realize that his desire for control is the perfect foil for her need to submit, and together, they are yin and yang.

hms-directory.title: The Years Between Them
author: Myst867
WinglessQuill
hms-directory.summary: When Hermione Granger met the much older Harry Potter one Wizengamot meeting, she had no idea what she was about to get into. An Age Gap, Ministry Harmony AU!

hms-directory.title: So It Goes
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: 'I don't think this is a good idea, Miss Granger—' 'I'm not your student anymore, Harry.' or Written for the HMS Harmony MAYhem event. Prompt: MAY to December romance, aka, Age Gap romance. (In which Hermione is Harry's former student that now works alongside him at Hogwarts.)

hms-directory.title: Funny Feelings
hms-directory.author: BananaCarrotFive
hms-directory.summary: A story set in Sixth Year, with some changes to Canon. Harmony is the focus for this story!

hms-directory.title: So Hot You're Hurting My Feelings
hms-directory.author: Xanisis
hms-directory.summary: Harry needs a date to Slughorn's Christmas Party. All he has to do is ask someone uncomplicated so that his newfound fans will leave him alone. Asking Hermione seems like the perfect solution. She's his friend, and she isn't about to fall ill with Harry fever just because the rest of school is, right?

hms-directory.title: Stranded On A Strange Purple Planet
hms-directory.author: LordCroussette
hms-directory.summary: PROMPT: Star Wars AU / Harry and Hermione meet in a galaxy far, far away. The life of Jedi Knight Hermione Granger was boring and lonely. After being knighted by her master, she was gifted a ship and told to travel through the galaxy while answering the Force's wishes. This was something she has been doing for years and while it was a life she was content living, she could not help but wish for companionship. Then, the Force guided her to a strange purple planet lorded over by the last surviving Imperial Inquisitor. Her ship destroyed, Hermione is stranded on the planet. Thankfully, she has help in the form of a spy in the Empire's rank who work for the Rebel Alliance, a fellow Jedi Knight and a friend from her childhood: Harry Potter. As Hermione assist Harry into completing his mission to destroy the Inquisitor, she can only wish the love she's developing for him will be reciprocated.

hms-directory.title: God Only Knows
hms-directory.author: RiverWriter
hms-directory.summary: Hermione thinks Harry needs a date to his cousin's wedding to show him off and have his back, and who's a better candidate than she is? Harry thinks he should do something for Hermione to show his appreciation. And so they- accidentally- spend December together. A trope stew Harmony Advent story.

hms-directory.title: How to get engaged to Hermione Granger
hms-directory.author: xFlora
hms-directory.summary: When Harry offers to help Hermione out by joining her at a quaint family diner, it's no big deal. But when he gets angered by her stupid cousin and decides to fake propose, it is. How far will they go to sustain their facade? And what happens when unwanted feelings start to blossom?This will be a romcom Harmony story. EWE. Post-Hogwarts. No Ginny/Ron-bashing. Rated E for sexually explicit scenes in chapter 4, 6, and almost every chapter from chapter 9 until the end. Read the notes if you want to know upfront if there is smut present in a certain chapter. This is for everyone who needs a pick-me-up right now!

hms-directory.title: Catalyst
hms-directory.author: VelvetInferno
hms-directory.summary: A potion accident sends Harry and Hermione out of their minds with lust, forcing them to rely on each other to satisfy themselves. What follows is a journey of mutual discovery- a sexual awakening that will change Harry and Hermione's relationship forever.

hms-directory.title: Best Laid Plans
hms-directory.author: hookedonfanfic
hms-directory.summary: Remember when Harry suggested in 'the Half Blood Prince' movie that he and Hermione should attend Slughorn's party together?Hermione of course, chooses to go with Cormac instead. Following that debacle, what if Hermione gets the 'brilliant' idea that she and Harry should pretend to date each other to get Ron's attention? Will they succeed? And with these two involved, how long can a pretend relationship stay just that - pretend?

hms-directory.title: Its Just Pretend
hms-directory.author: Harrys Mistress
hms-directory.summary: Hermione got both herself and Harry in quite a jam. The only way out of it is to pretend to date! Harry agrees to help Hermione, after all....it is just pretend...isn't it?

hms-directory.title: Oblivious
hms-directory.author: hphglover
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione pretend to date in order to keep Ron and Luna off their backs. The results are unexpected.

hms-directory.title: Playing a Part
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: It was supposed to be an act to shield him from his fangirls. But can what started out as a pretense become real?

hms-directory.title: Remember What I Forgot
hms-directory.author: AlwaysThatGuy
hms-directory.summary: Ten years after the defeat of Voldemort and fall of Harry Potter, footage emerges of a friend long thought dead. Finding him alive and unaware of his past, Hermione does what she does best. But with other factions in play and with nothing as it seems, how far will she go to find out the truth of what happened? H/HR.

hms-directory.title: Catching Smoke
hms-directory.author: ConRom1210
hms-directory.summary: There’s something oddly familiar and disarming about one of her regular customers.

hms-directory.title: Show Me A Hero (i'll write you a tragedy)
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter has no recollection of the magical world after the Battle of Hogwarts, but that doesn’t mean he winds up alone in his new life. or Hermione and Ron through the years, taking care of their former best friend and rebuilding their relationship with him step by step.

hms-directory.title: Forgotten But Not Gone
hms-directory.author: harmonyromionedramione
hms-directory.summary: Harry is shocked when Hermione wakes up one morning and can't remember the last five years of her life. Hermione is shocked by how much has changed. Summary not good but the story is good, give it a chance. Dh compliant but not epilogue. Mentions past Ron/ Hermione and Harry/Ginny. Now Complete.

hms-directory.title: Once, Twice, and Always
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: How do you go on when you've forgotten the last 16 months of your life? Harry has an accident and, as always, turns to Hermione for help.

hms-directory.title: Who Am I?
hms-directory.author: DZ2
hms-directory.summary: Challenge and story in one: details in the first chapter! When Harry awakens from an accident after the First Task, he finds that he can't recall the past four years at Hogwarts? What can a certain brunette do to help him? H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Memory Thief
hms-directory.author: CPO Backstreet
hms-directory.summary: Part 3 of my post-epilogue series. Harry and Hermione are finally getting married but an incident on their honeymoon looks set to ruin their happiness. Is there a connection with the escape from Azkaban?

hms-directory.title: I'd Do Anything
hms-directory.author: katediggory
hms-directory.summary: As Hermione was cursed in the final battle she tried to apparate to escape the curse. Years later Harry still searches for her, knowing that somewhere in the world his true love is alive with no memory of him, no memories of her life at all. Will she remember? Will they find each other again?

hms-directory.title: Roses in December
hms-directory.author: Solomon Aegis
hms-directory.summary: The battle is over and Voldemort is dead but not all the Death Eaters are vanquished or captured. Harry is on his way to return the Elder Wand to Dumbledore's tomb, when he is called back to the castle. No one other than the chosen one appears to know that Hermione is in grave danger, that her life, the very existance of the girl he secretly loves more than any other is about to be blasted into oblivion. One silly little spell has changed everything, is it possible for Harry to put it right and what will be the consequenses for them both?

hms-directory.title: Accio Memory
hms-directory.author: Amethyst and Goldy
hms-directory.summary: 'Right now, he was looking at a scared, lost girl. One who looked unbearably different from the self-assured Hermione who’d stood by his side over the years.' A spell goes wrong, leaving Hermione without memories of her life at Hogwarts. Now completed.

hms-directory.title: Come Find Me
hms-directory.author: joerandom
hms-directory.summary: In the summer after 5th year, Hermione is targeted by Death Eaters. One dies and she ends up banished; expelled from Hogwarts, her magic bound, she and her parents are obliviated. Now the Death Eater's are out for her blood, but she doesn't even know they are coming. And Harry finally comes to realise what she means to him. The beginning of a very new journey. AU H/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Lost Memories
hms-directory.author: Anlynne
hms-directory.summary: The war is the last memory Hermione has, but when she wakes she finds that her world has been different for a long time.

hms-directory.title: Visions of Eternal Day
hms-directory.author: TwitteringYellowBirds
hms-directory.summary: When an accident in the Department of Mysteries affects Harry’s memories, the only person who can help him recover is Hermione.

hms-directory.title: My Husband the Stranger
hms-directory.author: bra4goten
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione were married and in love. But when a friendly get together with friends leaves Hermione with a nasty bruise and no memory of her husband. It's up to Harry to help her through it and remember HH DG RL

hms-directory.title: Hermione, I Miss You
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: Hermione falls into a coma after being brutally beaten by a mystery assailant, leaving Harry to raise her three-year-old daughter, the father of whom is unknown. And when she wakes up, everything will have changed.

hms-directory.title: Give Me Another Chance
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: When Harry confesses his love for Hermione, she lies, telling him she loves Ron. 3 years later, she has a chance to tell him how she really feels, but he now has a girlfriend. Will they ever be together?

hms-directory.title: That Old House
hms-directory.author: vanillaparchment
hms-directory.summary: An old house sits at the end of a lane. Abandoned and forgotten, no one would have guessed who was going to buy it... or how full a life that old house was yet to live. Harry/Hermione

hms-directory.title: Found
hms-directory.author: DREWHHR
hms-directory.summary: Harry & Hermione stumble upon a baby in an alleyway. She has been abandoned and is near death. They take the baby to the hospital and end up adopting her. This story is about their adventures in being parents and being a family. H/Hr!

hms-directory.title: Love Lost. Love Found
hms-directory.author: Harrys Mistress
hms-directory.summary: When tragedy strikes both the Potter and Weasley family, the ones standing must be strong for their kids. But although their love is lost, can another be found?

hms-directory.title: Family Plans
hms-directory.author: CelestialSeaWitch
hms-directory.summary: The war has ended and the Golden Trio and their peers have only just managed to avoid the Ministry of Magic's new Marriage Law. This, of course, means very little when they're suddenly thrust into a Family Planning class that has couples forced together to take care of magically constructed children.

hms-directory.title: The Truth Behind a Story
hms-directory.author: Schlieren
hms-directory.summary: A quick step into the regular life of Harry and his family. A mostly sweet and fluffy story. AU.

hms-directory.title: Safe in Harbor
hms-directory.author: weird4hanson
