hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter:The-Boy-Who-Lived? Sure. Harry Potter:Quidditch Star? No problem. But Harry Potter:Single Parent? Of an infant? By himself? Crikey! And how does Hermione Granger factor into the whole thing? Set 8 years after Hogwarts.

hms-directory.title: Maybe Tomorrow
hms-directory.author: suzy_everdeen31
hms-directory.summary: The war has ended and Harry is feeling lost and disillusioned. At the encouragement of Hermione he begins to renovate Potter Manor. Over the Christmas Holidays, the two of them stay in the rundown estate and wake up on the morning of Christmas Eve in bed together, in the master suite, looking different than the night before. 'Harry?' Her eyes blinked sleepily, hand closing the short distance between them as her palm came to cup his cheek. 'You have a beard?'

hms-directory.title: On Our Way
hms-directory.author: MarsPotter
hms-directory.summary: Nine years since the war ended, things in England are different. Hermione has been away for 8 years at Columbia University and is returning to England to open a Wizarding Primary School. Harry is a single dad of three boys with a tenuous relationship with his globe-trotting ex-wife. Hermione has been by his side through 800+ letters written between them. She is coming home to a basket case of a best friend who has been shunned by most of his ex’s family and friends. Hermione moves into Grimmauld Place with Harry and the boys to show him that even through all the time, distance, and chaos of life, one thing has not changed, she will always be there for him and now maybe in a more than friends' kind of way.

hms-directory.title: Love Triangle
hms-directory.author: coolalisa
hms-directory.summary: Harry breaks up with Ginny after an incident between her and Hermione. A comment with malicious intent from Ginny makes Harry realize that he's in love with Hermione, who is dealing with her own feelings for Harry. Disregards epilogue in DH. Snape lives.

hms-directory.title: Ten Toes
hms-directory.author: GoingtoPigfarts (yukisukinomoto)
hms-directory.summary: After the war, the Weasely family mourns together and Harry and Hermione fall into each other. Harry chooses the Weaselys. Hermione chooses herself. Five years later and they meet again.

hms-directory.title: J'attendrai
hms-directory.author: hiboudeluxe
hms-directory.summary: In the aftermath of the war, Hermione makes a mistake or perhaps more correctly... several mistakes. Or maybe it was just one mistake made over and over and over again. After the disastrous end of a short-lived friends with benefits arrangement with Harry, Hermione quits England all together. As the song says, we you leave, you forget everything and until then... you wait. H/Hr

hms-directory.title: Breakfast In New York
hms-directory.author: Radaslab
hms-directory.summary: Hermione left to find her parents and was never seen nor heard from again until years later when an old friend stumbled into her at a hotel in New York. They would both learn things about each other neither had expected and found a life neither had.

hms-directory.title: Angelica
hms-directory.author: DeliverMeFromEve
hms-directory.summary: There are angels and demons; dreams and nightmares; magic and miracles. WARNINGS: Some R+Hr... very slight; a whisper, I promise (sorry R+L fans. Ain't happening in this story). Supernatural overtones later.

hms-directory.title: Pregnant by Possession
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: When a spell goes wrong a pair of ghostly lovers possess Harry and Hermione. The ghosts are very excited to be in possession of bodies again- and make full use of them. Now it's a month later and Hermione's period is late.

hms-directory.title: Ten Years after the War
hms-directory.author: Keira Marcos
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger is a Hit Witch for the International Protectorate of Magic. She’s attacked in her flat and in the midst of it comes online as a Sentinel. Confused and hurt, she apparates straight into the arms of her oldest friend–Harry Potter.

hms-directory.title: Complicated
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: Voldemort has been defeated for the last time. Harry Potter is the hero of the wizarding world... But no one in England knows where Harry is now. He left soon after the final battle and has been gone for more than a year. But why did he leave and when will he be ready to return? *Now Complete*

hms-directory.title: A Long Way Home
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione were once together but they broke up-- can they find their way together again, in spite of all the hurt? Angst.

hms-directory.title: Second Chances
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: He had given her up for the sake of friendship-- and left England immediately afterwards. Harry receives a surprise visitor and learns a lesson. But is it too late for love?

hms-directory.title: Let Me Come On Home
hms-directory.author: llorin
hms-directory.summary: Harry disappears for three long years after Voldemort's downfall. He returns home to find old friends waiting for him - and the surprise of his life. **completed!**

hms-directory.title: Soul Thief
hms-directory.author: Walter Sobchak
hms-directory.summary: 5 Years after defeating Voldemort, a simple error of judgment leads to catastrophe for Harry Potter. Hermione has to battle to reclaim her dearest friend and Harry must uncover the conspiracy that threatens them all in order to save a once bitter enemy.

hms-directory.title: Lost and Found
hms-directory.author: Inell
hms-directory.summary: It’s easy to get lost in London.

hms-directory.title: Coming Back
hms-directory.author: chem prof
hms-directory.summary: Post DH excluding Epilogue . Following his defeat of Voldemort, Harry finds the pressures of his even greater celebrity unbearable, and decides he needs to leave wizarding Britain. His best and truest friend makes him promise to return someday. H/Hr

hms-directory.title: Hanging By A Moment
hms-directory.author: Frumpologist
hms-directory.summary: Almost two years after the war, Harry Potter is living a quiet, studious life at Cardiff. His world is rocked when Hermione Granger shows up at his dorm room door.

hms-directory.title: Someone to Watch Over Me
hms-directory.author: simons_flower
hms-directory.summary: When Harry Potter returns after fifteen years with few explanations as to his whereabouts, Hermione Granger isn't exactly overjoyed to see him. At first.

hms-directory.title: Absent Truths
hms-directory.author: midnight-birth
hms-directory.summary: Harry returns after two and a half years to attend Ron and Luna's wedding, having disappeared before the first Christmas after the end of the war. Hermione has been living a half-life since then but is still not sure whether or not she is too hurt and angry to show how happy she is to have him back. These feelings are complicated by a certain incident which unexpectedly occurs between Harry and Hermione at Ron and Luna's wedding party on his first proper night back.

hms-directory.author: WordsmithMusings
hms-directory.summary: 5 years since she stopped looking for him, 4 words in the title of her favorite song, 3 friends out for a fun night, 2 Jade eyes that she would know anywhere, 1 more chance if they both dare. A Harmony AU where Harry disappeared from the Magical World only to go and get himself famous a second time - this time in the Muggle World.

hms-directory.title: The Letter
hms-directory.author: alexandra_emerson
hms-directory.summary: You know what, Hermione? I’m never going to be able to win you over with words. You know how I want to win you over? When you walk into my house tonight I want to push you against the wall and snog the breath out of you. I want to taste you and feel you moan against my mouth. I want to vanish whatever you’re wearing and look at you standing naked in my hallway. Hermione finds a letter from Harry she was never supposed to read. What now?

hms-directory.title: War Widow
hms-directory.author: anthfan
hms-directory.summary: After the war the Trio has split. Harry's disappeared and Hermione has turned away from magic as a way to deal with being alone. But now there is another threat to the wizarding world, and the Trio must unite once again.

hms-directory.title: Never Give Me A Marriage Law Challenge
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: A Harmony fic featuring a marriage law. One morning at breakfast the lives of a large chunk of Hogwarts students are changed forever. How will they cope? Will there be a happily ever after or will relationships fall apart? not canon, AU, no horcruxes, not so nice to Ron but seeking redemption for him. I apologize for a poor summary. Prologue offers more details about the story.

hms-directory.title: Escape
hms-directory.author: SingularOddities
hms-directory.summary: A marriage law is instigated during Hermione's sixth year. Hermione considers her options and makes her choice, it just wasn't the one they were expecting. By saving herself Hermione's decisions cause ripples to run through the Order. The game has changed, those left behind need to adapt to survive. Canon up to the HBP, Dumbledore lives, Horcrux are still in play.

hms-directory.title: The Plan
hms-directory.author: RiverWriter
hms-directory.summary: Five years ago a marriage law was enacted. Harry and Hermione did what they always do: she came up with a Plan and they tackled it together. Now they've fulfilled their obligations under the law and it's almost time for them to divorce and go their separate ways. Harry is far from happy about it, but does he dare tell his wife? Written for Harmony & Co's 2k Celebration.

hms-directory.title: Prologue to a Revolution
hms-directory.author: Starfox5
hms-directory.summary: After the Battle of Hogwarts, the prominent Death Eaters taken prisoners were tried and sentenced. But what happened to the rest of Voldemort's followers? What happened to the Snatchers and the others who did his bidding in the Ministry? Harry and Hermione are about to find out in the prologue to 'Hermione Granger and the Marriage Law Revolution'.

hms-directory.title: The Nine Month Bride
hms-directory.author: [ solas_fics ]
hms-directory.summary: She was his best friend. She was his best friend's girlfriend. So, why did marrying her feel like the greatest thing to ever happen to him?

hms-directory.title: The Last Attempt to Save the Pureblood Family Lines
hms-directory.author: raspberry dreams
hms-directory.summary: Voldemort was defeated at the ministry at the end of Harry's fifth year so Harry and his friends are looking forward to their first peaceful year at Hogwarts. Unfortunately, squib births among purebloods are at a record high. A new study reveals that a very low percentage of squibs are born couples who aren't both pureblood. The Wizengamot re-enacts an ancient marriage law.

hms-directory.title: Serendipity
hms-directory.author: mrsren
hms-directory.summary: Like any girl, Hermione has dreamed of her future nuptials, at least once or twice. So far it's not going so well. There's a marriage law, and well, Harry Potter to deal with.

hms-directory.title: A Marriage of Convenience
hms-directory.author: FS_VanceMcGill
hms-directory.summary: My Abridged Version of the Marriage Law Challenge. When Tonks overhears Minister Fudge and Lucius Malfoy discussing a Marriage Law Bill for the Wizengamot, she takes the information to the Order of the Phoenix. But a discussion she eavesdrops on after the Order meeting rubs her the wrong way and she hatches a plan with Remus and Sirius. The plan: get Harry Potter and Hermione Granger married as soon as possible.

hms-directory.title: For Love or The Law
hms-directory.author: Misskimmypotter
hms-directory.summary: When the ministry passes a law forcing people to get married, Harry and Hermione are matched with each other. Can they figure out how to express their true feelings while navigating their new life together?

hms-directory.title: The Truth About Love
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger was his best friend-- until one snub, one hint of scandal changes everything-- and their simple friendship is complicated by marriage. AU Regency fic.

hms-directory.title: A Most Advantageous Match
hms-directory.author: Amethyst
hms-directory.summary: AU - early 19th century England. Harry Potter must marry by his 18th birthday or risk losing his entire inheritance to his greedy relatives, the Dursleys. Who else could he turn to but his dear friend Hermione Granger?

hms-directory.title: Betrothed
hms-directory.author: Time Keeper
hms-directory.summary: Late into her first year Hermione receives a marriage contract. Rated M to be safe. Harry/Hermione primary pairing.

hms-directory.title: HRH Hermione Jane Charlotte Granger
hms-directory.author: IamBenson1
hms-directory.summary: What if Hermione was the sitting princess of modern day England? A/U R/R H/Hr (Massive Ron Bashing- Don't like, don't read) Rated T for now, might change later!

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Witch from Avalon
hms-directory.author: ImAFilthyMelon
hms-directory.summary: Lord Hadrien James Potter's seemingly-perfect life at Hogwarts is thrown into chaos when waifish, sickly Hermione Dagworth-Granger returns perfectly healthy, with untamed family magic and war in her eyes.

hms-directory.title: Lady of the House
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9_aka_MistressL
hms-directory.summary: Reading the Potter and Black Family Grimoire, Harry Potter realizes that he needed the best witch as a life partner. So, with advice from his ancestors and careful planning, he wins the heart of the best witch in Britain because a Black always gets the best and a Potter always marries the most loyal.

hms-directory.title: The Reclamation of Black Magic
hms-directory.author: ShayaLonnie
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter's family isn't only at Number 4 Privet Drive. Unaware to even Dumbledore, an upheaval is approaching. The Ancient and Noble House of Black is reclaiming their power and changing the future of the magical world. *Update: May 2020 — This story has been getting a lot of new readers lately, so I wanted to let you know that, yes, this story is currently on hiatus. As with many writers, I struggle with mental health issues, but I am working on them AND working on getting back to this story as soon as I possibly can. I sincerely thank you for your sweet comments and patience*

hms-directory.title: The Ancient and Most Noble House of Potter
hms-directory.author: Invieri
hms-directory.summary: In a world larger and more complicated than anyone could expect, how will Harry Potter navigate and survive when raised by House Black – an Ancient and Noble family with a long and bloody history? Surrounded by powerful new players watch House Potter rise from the ashes of defeat and reclaim their place in the annals of history, by any means necessary.

hms-directory.title: Lady Hermione and the Duke
hms-directory.author: harmonious (accidentally_hi)
hms-directory.summary: Ever since she was young, Hermione has been trapped inside the castle by her father. She wishes nothing more than to be free.

hms-directory.title: Regency Harmony
hms-directory.author: Renny236
hms-directory.summary: Life tragedies send Miss Hermione Granger on an extended visit to Muggle London, where she meets Lord Harry Potter. Harry’s a Wizard, but has always planned to follow in his father’s footsteps by accepting his seat in Parliament. Yet somehow meeting Hermione has him increasingly uncertain that his planned life will make him happy. Hermione cannot imagine living her life outside of a magical community, but cannot deny her increasing attraction to Lord Potter. And what is causing these odd magical surges the two feel whenever they are together?

hms-directory.title: A Step to the Right
hms-directory.author: CatsAreCool (Rachel500)
hms-directory.summary: When Harry saves Hermione's life, they find themselves in a different world and in the middle of another magical war - but at least they have each other.

hms-directory.title: A Marauder's Plan
hms-directory.author: CatsAreCool (Rachel500)
hms-directory.summary: What if Sirius decided to stay in England and deliver on his promise to raise Harry instead of hiding somewhere sunny? Changes abound with that one decision…

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter's Secret Weapon
hms-directory.author: VashonBeader
hms-directory.summary: A plot to bring back the Dark Lord, one way or another. A new family life for Harry. But how to finally defeat Moldy once and for all? Harry needs a secret weapon, and a little elf needs a new home. AU Harmony.

hms-directory.title: The Erstwhile Heiress
hms-directory.author: MaryRoyale
hms-directory.summary: Once Hermione McGonagall had been the envy of Albion--Heiress to two Noble Houses and betrothed to the Heir to Gryffindor--but all that had slipped through her fingers when she failed to Manifest. Years later, an invitation to the reopening of Slytherin Tower might change everything.

hms-directory.title: Incomplete
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter screwed up big time which caused his best friend to leave. Five years after Hermione left, Harry has never lost hope of finding her again. When he does find her, it's of the most complicated circumstances. He was to be the bodyguard of the Queen of Karthegenia. With their unresolved past, could he convince her to forgive him?

hms-directory.title: For The First Time
hms-directory.author: Anjie
hms-directory.summary: In a world where muggle-born women are bought as slaves for the pleasure of wizards, Hermione did not have much to look forward to. That is until Prince Harry came along. AU fic. Rated M for later chapters.

hms-directory.title: Blind No More
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9
hms-directory.summary: After the war, all was well in Harry Potter's world until he realized that the males of the Wizarding World now have their eyes on his best friend, Hermione Granger. When he realizes he wants her for himself, desperate times call for desperate measures. Lord Potter-Black comes in action and performs the ultimate caveman move that'll go down in history.

hms-directory.title: Of Prejudice Magic & Love
hms-directory.author: Christina-Potter-09
hms-directory.summary: Century AU fic. Miss Hermione Jane Granger & Mr. Harry James Potter must marry for their respective reasons... problem is... they must marry each other in a time of Prejudices, Secrets, Sensibility, Freedom and Duty...How on earth will they survive?...

hms-directory.title: A Game of Hearts
hms-directory.author: Twitch E. Littleferret
hms-directory.summary: A/U. Set in the Regency era. Harry comes home from the war hoping for a life of peace and tranquility and maybe find himself a suitable and proper wife. But his estranged godfather draws him into his dangerous lifestyle where Harry finds himself irresistably drawn to a scandalous socialite and a sinister plot to bring Lord Voldemort back to power.

hms-directory.title: A Dubious Affair
hms-directory.author: SoftObsidian74
hms-directory.summary: It’s not Hermione’s fault she’s cheating on her husband Ron - Harry makes her do it.

hms-directory.title: The Flaw in the Plan
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: It was utter madness but at that moment, Harry could not remember any of the reasons why he absolutely should not be kissing Hermione, could not remember why this was wrong; he only knew he had to... Affair!fic.

hms-directory.title: The Anatomy of a Love Affair
hms-directory.author: Bingblot
hms-directory.summary: The beginning and the end of a love affair. Affair!fic- smut, angst, and a bit of fluff. One-shot smut.

hms-directory.title: City of Sins
hms-directory.author: julestales
hms-directory.summary: 'We can never tell anyone...' she whispered as Harry pinned her against the cold window. 'This belongs to us, only us...' he confirmed, tugging at her bathrobe belt.

hms-directory.title: Stregati
hms-directory.author: Ely_Baby
hms-directory.summary: Everything is possible in Venice, even what you thought would never happen.

hms-directory.title: Moments of Closeness
hms-directory.author: angweasley
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione have always had a deep bond, a strong connection that has been a constant in Harry's life since he was 11 years old. When this bond shifts one particular Halloween, shifts into something not easily explained, the two struggle to define what it means and what will come of it.

hms-directory.title: All My Loving
hms-directory.author: SpicySugar
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is engaged to Ron and Harry to Ginny and everyone is happy, or so they think. What happens when memories brew sexual tension between Harry and Hermione? Who really loves who? Is it love at all? Romance/Drama.

hms-directory.title: Fulfilling Obligations
hms-directory.author: forbiddenharmony7
hms-directory.summary: Did you ever wonder what happened in the 19 years between the last chapter and the epilogue of Deathly Hallows? Or what happens afterward? Totally, completely, and eventually H/Hr, but we have a long road to get there! Rated T for language & sexuality.

hms-directory.title: Daydream Believer
hms-directory.author: Motherof4dragons
hms-directory.summary: The new romance series that Hermione was reading featuring Alphas and Omegas was hot. Too hot, maybe, because her thighs are slick and there's an ache building in her gut that her fingers alone just can't handle anymore. What's a Witch to do? Beta test one of WWW new adult daydreams, of course. But shit goes sideways when Harry shows up. Because, it's Harry, and shit always goes sideways when he's around. Now they're stuck in the daydream together with only one way out. BOTH of them have got to orgasm first.

hms-directory.title: The Changing of Destiny
hms-directory.author: Banksie94
hms-directory.summary: Hermione decides to fix the issues she sees in the mirror but what she does changes everything.

hms-directory.title: Hers
hms-directory.author: orphan_account
hms-directory.summary: Hermione finally takes what she's always wanted.

hms-directory.title: More Than Fate
hms-directory.author: NuclearNik
hms-directory.summary: Harry stumbles on more than he could have imagined when he shows up for weekly pizza night.

hms-directory.title: Her Scent
hms-directory.author: AlexandraO
hms-directory.summary: Magic decides the population is too low post war, sending young adults into an uncontrollable frenzy, something that hasn’t happened since the early 1900’s. When Hermione is unexpectedly sent into heat, can Harry help her through it? A/B/O Harmony.

hms-directory.title: Fever
hms-directory.author: mrsren
hms-directory.summary: So what if it's just one thing after another? Learning she's an Omega isn't going to change her life. It's not going to control her. Hermione Granger is rarely wrong, but when she is - oh, she's really missed the mark.

hms-directory.title: The Price of Victory
hms-directory.author: jamcreynolds
hms-directory.summary: Things aren't as they seem as Harry, Hermione, and Ron set off to hunt horcruxes. Hermione has been potioned, Harry hit a growth spurt, and Ginny just won't leave him alone. After Ron abandons his two friends in the tent, Harry and Hermione discover just what it was being hidden from them and how it will change not only their lives but the outcome of the war. An a/b/o story.

hms-directory.title: Hierarchy Blessings
hms-directory.author: littlesleepingbird
hms-directory.summary: Harry follows Hermione back to Hogwarts following the war to finish his education and try to live a nice, calm life. Hermione is changing, Harry can't figure her out. They learn together about ancient hierarchy inheritance blessings, and what it means for their own futures.

hms-directory.title: Omega
hms-directory.author: LuxLouise
hms-directory.summary: Hermione comes of age.

hms-directory.title: Let Me Keep You
hms-directory.author: Saylahvie
hms-directory.summary: The students of Hogwarts are required to submit to designation testing prior to their 7th year. How will Harry react to the revelation that he's an Omega?

hms-directory.title: Burke House
author: A_LoveUnlaced
thebrightcity
hms-directory.summary: Something strange is happening to Harry Potter, and Hermione Granger would never abandon a friend in need. Especially not Harry. She knows he'd never do anything to hurt her.

hms-directory.title: There Will Be No Foolish Wand Waving
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Petunia Evans always wanted to be just like Lily. The thought of learning magic would make her giddy with excitement. However a rejection letter from the headmaster of Hogwarts blew that dream out the window. What would've happened instead if the wife of the owner of Flourish and Blott's had taken a bit of pity and shown Petunia that you didn't need a wand to do magic?

hms-directory.title: Patron
hms-directory.author: Starfox5
hms-directory.summary: In an Alternate Universe where muggleborns are a tiny minority and stuck as third-class citizens, formally aligning herself with her best friend, the famous Boy-Who-Lived, seemed a good idea. It did a lot to help Hermione's status in the exotic society of a fantastic world so very different from her own. And it allowed both of them to fight for a better life and better Britain.

hms-directory.title: Yesterday, Today, Tomorrow
hms-directory.author: Untold Harmony
hms-directory.summary: James and Lily grew to love Hermione Granger for different reasons. Lily loved her for her intelligence and quick wit. James loved her for her spirit and fierce nature. Throughout the years, they watched as their son realize that he loved her too. [One-shot, pure fluff.]

hms-directory.title: From the World Beyond
hms-directory.author: Proton6
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione go to the Department of Mysteries two weeks after the Battle of Hogwarts to destroy the dangerous Deathly Hallows. Never did Harry imagine, however, that when he cast the three Hallows through the Veil, he would be exchanging them for three lost lives and a second chance at having the family and life that he had lost so long ago. Jily Meets Harmony Challenge.

hms-directory.title: Star-bright Fate
hms-directory.author: ArdenSkyeHolmes221
hms-directory.summary: 'Lily, we’ve got another letter for you!' She peers over her shoulder, quirking a brow at Sirius’s proclamation until she spots Hedwig perched on her husband’s high-backed chair. 'Harry wrote too?' James shakes his head, 'No. Better yet— it’s from Hermione.'  And so it begins.

hms-directory.title: It All Started With Halloween, 1981
hms-directory.author: peachesbaby
hms-directory.summary: Sirius stepped into the collapsed room and saw Lily laying on the floor in front of Harry, and the tears finally fell as he picked up his godson and sank to the floor, rocking the child back and forth when Lily stirred. Lily survives the attack, how does this change the story? Rated M for future chapters.

hms-directory.title: Chandelier
hms-directory.author: Artemis Day
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter, Alan Granger immediately decided, was probably the worst sort of son-in-law imaginable. Based on a true story. HHR.

hms-directory.title: Of Quidditch Pants and Persuasion
hms-directory.author: It's Just Not Flowing
hms-directory.summary: Full title: The One Where The Entire Gryffindor Common Room Lusts After Harry Wearing Quidditch Pants and Hermione is Persuasive. That's rather self-explanatory, I think. Really, it's just best to move on. Equally pointless second chapter now added.

hms-directory.title: Once Upon A Holiday
hms-directory.author: MrsRen
hms-directory.summary: Frigid. Boring. That's how Hermione Granger sees herself following a bitter breakup on the previous Christmas. Planning to make the annual trip home to her family, she's not looking forward to discussing her relationship status. That's where Harry comes in.

hms-directory.title: Way of the Magic Househusband
hms-directory.author: Andrew Joshua Talon
hms-directory.summary: Auror Captain? Like hell. Harry will be far happier as a househusband... Inspired by the manga 'The Way of the House Husband'. Enjoy! For the HMS Harmony Discord's MAYhem event.

hms-directory.title: The Bet
hms-directory.author: SweetShireen
hms-directory.summary: 'Ron.' Harry took a deep breath. 'Hermione and I—' 'Are getting married,' Ron interrupted. Harry froze. 'How... did you know?' Ron rolled his eyes and pulled out the binder he had hidden in his jacket. 'Sit down, I've had the whole thing planned for years.

hms-directory.title: Up To No Good
hms-directory.author: Untold Harmony
hms-directory.summary: With great power comes great responsibility. As the second oldest Potter child in Hogwarts, Henry Potter was tasked to be the keeper of the magical document which showed all of the school. He only uses it for emergencies though, since his parents stressed the importance of responsibility. Besides, he definitely wasn't ready to see what he saw on the Marauder's Map. [One-shot]

hms-directory.title: Harry's Fantastic Photographs and Where to Find Them
hms-directory.author: AzothSabre
hms-directory.summary: Ever since first year, Harry's had a problem.. He's just to darn photogenic and no matter what he seems to do there's always a photo the next day in the newspaper calling him the next merlin.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Sword of Gryffindor
hms-directory.author: serpentclone
hms-directory.summary: A special book helps Harry tap into the power the Dark Lord knows not. Of course it’s a book on sex magic and rituals… but Harry’s not complaining. Spurned on by the ghost of a pervert founder, Harry leads his friends in the hunt for Voldemort’s Horcruxes. EROTIC COMEDY! Loads of crude humor and sexual situations!

hms-directory.title: The Stress Measurement Utilization Tool
hms-directory.author: glitterwitch1 (jolie_unfiltrd)
hms-directory.summary: 'Do you remember how stressed we all were throughout Hogwarts?' Harry gave her a significant look. 'Yeah, ‘course I do.' 'Even after Voldemort, when I was back at Hogwarts for my eighth year, I was still stressed. And I couldn’t quite understand why. So, I started doing some research, and I developed a theory.' Hermione sighed in exasperation at the mere memory of her eighteen-year-old self. 'I want to remind you, before I go into this theory, that we were all traumatized by the war and I absolutely should have seen a Mind Healer earlier than I did.' She tapped her chin in consideration, and continued. 'Also, I blame hormones.' ——— Or: Harry and Hermione get together, snog on the couch, talk about their sexual histories and look at some graphs. Not necessarily in that order.

hms-directory.title: In Crime
hms-directory.author: Saydria Wolfe
hms-directory.summary: When she woke up in her bed twenty years in the past, Hermione had a very clear to do list. Step 1.) Get to Diagon Alley. Step 2.) Bring her Harry back. Step 3.) Utterly destroy the Weasleys.

hms-directory.title: A Harmonious Beginning
hms-directory.author: SeventhChordHarmony
hms-directory.summary: One small act of kindness can change everything. Harry Potter is about to discover how important Harmony is. Starts from the beginning, follows canon with more changes as it progresses. Rated M for language, violence in later chapters.

hms-directory.title: The Adventures of Harry Potter and Hermione Granger
hms-directory.author: RefyxzHarmony
hms-directory.summary: We all know that Harry met the Weasleys at the barrier between Platform Nine and Ten. But what if, by a tiny twist of fate, something happened a moment prior and he met someone else instead? Pure H/HR - Fluff Galore - Full series rewrite [ON HIATUS]

hms-directory.title: Rewrite The Stars
hms-directory.author: FS_VanceMcGill
hms-directory.summary: Fate doesn’t like what he sees happening on the events of September 1st, 2017, at King’s Cross. So he looks back and changes one little thing. How can one tiny change rewrite the stars for a Muggle-Raised Wizard and a Muggleborn Witch? Not for Dumbledore, Ron, Ginny and Molly Weasley fans!

hms-directory.title: Against the World, You and I
hms-directory.author: Continuedinterests
hms-directory.summary: Harry puts down the plate in his hands and leans over, so that he is looking right over Hermione’s shoulder. The leaf in her hands turns purple, then a vibrant neon blue. Harry’s whole body seems to tighten, he forgets to breathe. He palms the glass by her shoulder, like he can melt through it to her, to grab her and keep her there. In a second the leaf is back to its original yellow, and then she’s gone, taking quick strides, pulling a car door open. The leaf is blown away as a breeze comes through. Harry’s still standing there, his hand pressed to the glass. It seems like it's time to pay the Granger’s a visit. An AU were Voldemort comes back when Harry is six or so and he and Hermione never go to Hogwarts. Voldemort hasn't forgotten him.

hms-directory.title: The Boy-Who-Lived... Is Over There
hms-directory.author: Tyrannic_Puppy
hms-directory.summary: Harry James Potter is not the Boy-Who-Lived, but he does go to school with him. A little off if you ask Harry, that Neville Longbottom, always running around getting into trouble.

hms-directory.title: Childhood Sweethearts
hms-directory.author: Catstaff
hms-directory.summary: Based on this prompt from Harmony & Co's Prompt Bank: Pre-Hogwarts. Harry is 6, Hermione is almost 7. They grew up close neighbors and in a fit of childish pique, decide to get 'married.' The wedding is attended by their favorite plushies and by a couple of friends. One of the Potter elves officiates. The parents think it’s the cutest thing in the world, even magic is giggling. Cut forward to when they get their Letters to Hogwarts and find out that magic wasn’t giggling from childish amusement but from the long term prank it just pulled on the wizarding world. Hilarity ensues…

hms-directory.title: Next Door
hms-directory.author: Myricle
hms-directory.summary: The Grangers live next to the Dursleys, and they don't like what they hear.

hms-directory.title: Kiss on the Balcony
hms-directory.author: tweetysrcclt9
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter was young when he first met Hermione Granger. Who knew that years later, their first meeting would be reenacted on the most important day of their lives? A one-shot based on the song, Love Story by Taylor Swift.

hms-directory.title: A Different Halloween
hms-directory.author: RobSt
hms-directory.summary: Could a chance meeting change history? What would a different Halloween in 1981 mean for wizarding Britain?

hms-directory.title: Dispelling the Silence
hms-directory.author: Indygodusk
hms-directory.summary: As a cousin of Gabrielle and Fleur Delacour, Hermione studied in France. Because Hermione never went to Hogwarts, things changed. Some people who died now live and others who lived are dead. Now a new evil stalks Britain as children disappear from their homes. Harry and Hermione meet for the first time, finding themselves in the middle of the mystery as they struggle to trust each other and protect the ones they love. Will Hermione’s mysterious past prove the key to save them all? Or will it lead to their destruction?

hms-directory.title: Dispelling the Lies
hms-directory.author: Indygodusk
hms-directory.summary: The attack wouldn’t have happened if Hermione hadn’t insisted on buying the chocolates. That was her first mistake. The second was lying to everyone about what happened afterwards, though the mass hysteria over the dead unicorn and what came after wasn’t her fault, no matter what Malfoy later claimed.

hms-directory.title: A Day in December
hms-directory.author: GLNargle and Coffee Reveries
hms-directory.summary: In 2008, British secret agent and wizard Harry Potter meets muggle journalist and author Hermione Granger during a mission in Austria on Christmas Eve. What he thought would be a one-time encounter turns into tradition as two wildly different people become friends and meet once a year in a different place of the world. Eventually, friendship turns into love.

hms-directory.title: Magic and Misperceptions
hms-directory.author: addisonj
hms-directory.summary: A Harry and Hermione version of a modern Pride & Prejudice. Harry is a returning war hero who meets Beauxbatons graduate, Hermione Granger. He thinks she's a silly Quidditch fangirl and she thinks he's a snob. AU obviously. R/L as well. Completed.

hms-directory.title: Strange Potter
hms-directory.author: Herrin26
hms-directory.summary: The night Dumbledore placed a young baby on the doorstep he thought he was doing what was best for the future. However another presence threw a wrench in his 'plan'. Dr.Strange/Avengers + Harry Potter crossover AU set in modern time.

hms-directory.title: Raised by Wolves
hms-directory.author: hellbells
hms-directory.summary: Raised by Wolves is usually an expression but Albus Dumbledore is horrified when he realises that for the golden boy, Harry Potter, it was a fact!

hms-directory.title: Master Of Dying
hms-directory.author: Motherof4dragons
hms-directory.summary: Harry One minute I'm in Malfoy Manor, the next I'm being yelled at for dying. Again Apparently I'm rather good at it. Honestly, it's not that shocking. How am I supposed to stay alive when it's three against an army and we're working off of faulty information? When Mortimer said he was sending me back again, my first response was anger. Yet another Old Man making decisions for my life. Until I saw the headful of riotous curls on the other side of Death's hallway. I don't care what they do to me, but they fucked up when the killed Hermione. The next time I die, I'm taking Riddle and all his minions with me. AKA-My take on the Reptile28 Challenge.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Angry Grim Reaper
hms-directory.author: TomHRichardson
hms-directory.summary: My answer to Reptilia28’s “Don’t Fear the Reaper” Challenge. Six times has Harry Potter died young instead of fulfilling his destiny of killing Tom Riddle and of marrying his soulmate Hermione. The seventh time that Harry’s soul is sent into his younger body, Harry keeps his older memories and he has a plan. But this time, if he fails, both his body and soul shall die. This is an H/Hr story that bashes Dumbledore and our most unfavourite Weasleys.

hms-directory.title: The Harmony Drawer
hms-directory.author: Carib0u
hms-directory.summary: Where I will put one-shots and started stories that may filter back into my long stories as chapters or may be the start of a new story. WARNING! Some of the stories herein will change all the time. Most won't, but I decided I like putting my drafts of chapters in as chapters here, looking at them, then editing them. Sometimes, theyll just be storified versions of chapters in a longer work. Notes: DISCLAIMER: I am, obviously, JK Rowling under a pseudonym. Since my last cry for help, The Cursed Child, was ignored, I decided to write something even less similar to the seven books of the Harry Potter series. All rights reserved, or, if you are reading this in America, not really, actually, very reserved at all, are they? Please, good people, stop me before the voices make me write again!

hms-directory.title: Because I Could Not Stop for Death
hms-directory.author: MBM
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter, the Boy Who Lived, has died. Voldemort has won, and all his sacrifices were for naught. Surprisingly, the one who is angriest about it is his own Grim Reaper because his third time wasn’t a charm after all. He’s got to convince his Reaper that he’s worth betting on one last time, knowing that if he fails again, they’re both screwed.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and Destiny's Last Chance
hms-directory.author: Kowareta_Tenshi
hms-directory.summary: This was originally posted on FF.net but I'm more active here. My take on Reptilia28's 'Don't Fear the Reaper' challenge. Harry is sent back to his third year on his last chance to fulfill his destiny and change his life for the better. Can he defeat Voldemort, get the girl, and keep his Death from getting fired? Contains a few characters from Black Butler and romance. Manipulative Dumbledore. Ron getting called out on his bullshit.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and Afterlife Inc.
hms-directory.author: Dunuelos
hms-directory.summary: My own response to Reptilia28's challenge. Harry died in the battle with Voldemort. What happens when he meets the Grim Reaper? Especially when the Reaper isn't happy with him. Rating changed to more appropriate one. HHr. Other pairings as they come.

hms-directory.title: Forty One Times Dead
hms-directory.author: Ruskbyte
hms-directory.summary: Harry has an annoying habit of dying before his time. After one death too many, the Soul Reaper assigned to the case decides to take matters in hand and train the Boy-Who-Lived up to scratch. Good thing he's already dead; 'cause this just might kill him!

hms-directory.title: Reboot
hms-directory.author: Kallanit
hms-directory.summary: Very loosely based on the Reptilia28 Don't Fear the Reaper Death Challenge, whereby Harry gets to relive his life. As do a couple of other people. What effect does this have on Harry's life and the Voldemort Blood wars? Not a Discworld crossover, but some guest appearances by Death's granddaughter. Some character bashing. No Cursed Child or Fantastic Beasts. COMPLETE.

hms-directory.title: Rise of Darkness from the Fall
hms-directory.author: PercabethHarmione
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter becomes the dark lord after the death of his lover to make changes in society but he fails to rejoin his lover but is given a second chance and he grabs it with both of his hands.

hms-directory.title: Never Let Go
hms-directory.author: Forgive_Me_Severus
hms-directory.summary: One year after the Battle of Hogwarts, on a day usually reserved for happiness and the celebration of love, Harry Potter takes his own life. He has lost too many people in his short life, but the death of the one person he thought would never leave him breaks him completely. Not one day has passed where nightmares don't plague his dreams, where he doesn't see her dead body in front of his eyes. With his last breath he hopes that there really is an after life. When he opens his eyes, he's confronted with the concerned gaze of one Hermione Granger and finds himself transported back in time. This time, he'll never let her go.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Phoenix Wand
hms-directory.author: Lowten
hms-directory.summary: My take on a harry go's back to fix things fic. When Harry accidentally breaks his wand he is engulfed in Phoenix flames and finds himself back in olivander's when he first bounded with his wand. armed with knowledge of the future how can harry change things for a better tomorrow.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Simplest Solution Part I
hms-directory.author: evenmoreimprobable
hms-directory.summary: Harry boards the Hogwarts Express for his first year at Hogwarts, but everything is not what it seems. Harry has come back from the future to defeat Voldemort, but he only has a few hours in which to do it. He needs to find the simplest solution... A unique and fast-moving Harmony 'redo' like nothing you've ever seen before. :)

hms-directory.title: Once More with Feeling
hms-directory.author: NamelessGrunt
hms-directory.summary: There was something strange about Harry when she saw him in Diagon Alley that day, at the cusp of their third year. He was different, knew things he shouldn't, and secrets swam in those emerald eyes. She felt her shoulders quake when he looked at her, really looked at her, and took her smaller hands in his calloused own. [Harmony, HHr, TT, Fluff, Complete]

hms-directory.title: The Many Deaths of Harry Potter
hms-directory.author: ShayneT
hms-directory.summary: In a world with a pragmatic, intelligent Voldemort, Harry discovers that he has the power to live, die and repeat until he gets it right.

hms-directory.title: Returning to the Start
hms-directory.author: timunderwood9
hms-directory.summary: Harry killed them once. Now that he is eleven he'll kill them again. Hermione knows her wonderful best friend has a huge secret, but that just means he needs her more. A H/Hr time travel romance where they don't become a couple until Hermione is twenty one, and Harry kills death eaters without the help of children.

hms-directory.title: Just A Hint of Vanilla
hms-directory.author: Bellwhether
hms-directory.summary: Harry unintentionally travels back in time and gets the chance to fix a past mistake. But when he returns to the future he discovers that one seemingly insignificant choice has changed his present, altering the dynamic of the trio. Now the past is slowly fading and Harry's not ready for the new reality.

hms-directory.title: The Present is a Point Just Passed
hms-directory.author: mortenavida
hms-directory.summary: There wasn't a day that passed where she wished things could change, where she could find out how this happened set things right. Luna remembered the Department of Mysteries, but something told her that this started before that. Perhaps even before time and magic and people came to be. A time-travel fic where Ginny, Harry, Hermione, Luna, Neville, and Ron are thrown into different parts of time and must find each other.

hms-directory.title: Unity
hms-directory.author: LordCroussette
hms-directory.summary: Part of the Scrap Bin Collection, a series of unfinished and discontinued stories that never saw the light of day. Published here for the purpose of archiving and for the interest of readers. James and Lily Potter were being bored to death during one of the Order of the Phoenix's monthly meetings when, suddenly, three consecutives flashes of gold light were seen over the table. The Potters never expected to find two people and a baby once the light dimmed, especially not their time travelling son from the future, his wife and their daught Abandoned rewrite of The Time Travelling Potters.

hms-directory.title: The Time Travelling Potters
hms-directory.author: LordCroussette
hms-directory.summary: James, Lily, Fleamont and Euphemia are bored to death during an Order meeting taking place at Potter Manor. What they never expected during their half-asleep mind-ranting was for James and Lily's son to travel back in time from the future with his wife and their daughter. Suddenly, they have hope that they will be able to kill Voldemort for good.

hms-directory.title: The Winds of Time
hms-directory.author: ausland
hms-directory.summary: A change of events during the Horcrux Hunt; Hermione is sent to another dimension, trapped in Hogwarts during the Maruaders' seventh year- 1977. She has to wait for the winter solstice, when Harry will come, and the summer solstice, which will send them both back.

hms-directory.title: Time is the Fire
hms-directory.author: Oddment Tweak
hms-directory.summary: What would you do if the only way to save the person you loved was to sacrifice everything else that you held dear? DH-Epilogue compliant, sort of. Some HP/GW and RW/Hr, but ultimately, epically, HP/Hr.

hms-directory.title: Inseparable
hms-directory.author: Ares.Granger
hms-directory.summary: A hopefully different time travel story. Adult Harry and Hermione jump back in time to the Halloween the Potters were killed and baby Harry became an orphan. These adult versions change the past in the hopes of a better future. Won't-know-what-hit-him Dumbledore, AU, Harry/Hermione.

hms-directory.title: The Annulment
hms-directory.author: Jwall882
hms-directory.summary: Who would have known a soul bond could change so much, yet keep so much the same. A time travel fic that changes the original story line. Currently Rated T for some language.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger and the Butterfly Effect
hms-directory.author: Rouch
hms-directory.summary: One month after the final battle, Hermione struggles to find her place in the wizarding world while dealing with fallout from her trauma. Consequences of decisions made in the past continue to have a lasting impact on the present. Chaos isn't just a theory when old enemies come back and use time as their weapon.

hms-directory.title: Hermione Granger and the Wounds of Time
hms-directory.author: Rouch
hms-directory.summary: Tom Riddle has a plan to change his destiny. Harnessing every magical resource at his disposal he does the impossible but wasn't prepared for the consequences. Hermione Granger finds herself pulled through time and must find her way back to an uncertain future. A/N: After rereading and proofreading, I've fixed some issues from the fanfic net version but there are no changes to plot. I'm working on the sequel (it's about a third complete) and plan to post to this site so I wanted to make sure the first installment was also here.

hms-directory.title: A Little Child Shall Lead Them
hms-directory.author: White_Squirrel
hms-directory.summary: After the war, Hermione is haunted by the friends she lost, so she comes up with an audacious plan to fix it, starting way back with Harry's parents. Now, all she has to do is get herself taken seriously in 1981, and then find a way to get her old life back when she's done.

hms-directory.title: Second Time Love
hms-directory.author: broomstick flyer
hms-directory.summary: Hermione makes a potion that will take her back in time to put right the mistakes she made, the worst of which was marrying the wrong man. Why she married Ron she did not know, she did know it was the biggest mistake she ever made.

hms-directory.title: The Needs of the One
hms-directory.author: Witherwings01
hms-directory.summary: Twelve years after the war and Hermione is still waiting for her happily ever after to begin as she cares for a mentally tortured Harry. She has a plan to save him but must choose between the needs of the many or the one. Timetravel with a twist. AU. H/Hr

hms-directory.title: Be Careful of What You Wish For
hms-directory.author: Christina Potter
hms-directory.summary: Post DH No-Ep. my 70th story. We all have wished to know what happens in the Future... Only Hermione Granger made that wish before the wrong Loony witch who is tired of Hermione & Harry's misery and unexpressed feelings...HHR please R&R!

hms-directory.title: Seven encounters in the past
hms-directory.author: JJ Granger Potter
hms-directory.summary: The unexpected visit of a Hermione that comes from the future radically changes Harry's attitude about his life and his decisions. Now he has the time counted to prevent Voldemort from winning. However, that also changes his relationship with his best friend forever: you can't introduce a sensual witch to a 12-year-old boy and not expect him to fall in love with her.

hms-directory.title: Palimpsest
hms-directory.author: Larry Huss
hms-directory.summary: Hermione gets some of the answers early. She has trouble understanding what all the questions are.

hms-directory.title: The Meaning of a Second Chance
hms-directory.author: Elwyn (Iltazyara)
hms-directory.summary: Harry is entered into the Tri-Wizard Tournament against his will, Ron ditches him, and Hermione is acting oddly. If Harry didn't already have too much to worry about, he might question that last one a little more.

hms-directory.title: Double Time
hms-directory.author: Elwyn (Iltazyara)
hms-directory.summary: Hermione had just kissed Harry on the cheek and watched him leave with the Dursleys when she learnt that Time Travel doesn’t always work out as planned. Sometimes, things double up. And really, how the hell is anyone supposed to account for that?

hms-directory.title: Come Back to Me
hms-directory.author: Darth Mittens
hms-directory.summary: As Voldemort dies, he hits Harry with a spell that blasts him to an alternate universe where Voldemort never existed. Everything seems good until he learns two things: 1. He's in love with Hermione Granger, and 2. She's a muggle who has never met him.

hms-directory.title: Desire
hms-directory.author: Witherwings01
hms-directory.summary: What is the deepest and most desperate desire of Hermione's heart? Set six years after Voldemort's fall, Hermione learns the life she has fought so hard for is not quite everything she dreamt of. Will be H/Hr...eventually.

hms-directory.title: The Samhain Shift
hms-directory.author: MayorHaggar
hms-directory.summary: When an experiment goes awry, Hermione finds herself in a world not her own, with someone she thought lost to her forever.

hms-directory.title: Parallels
hms-directory.author: Bobmin356
hms-directory.summary: Harry has won the war and lost everything he held near and dear. In desperation he gambles everything on a dimensional jump. HPHG Bad Weasleys good Dumbledore. Rated for language and implied sex.

hms-directory.title: Shadow Walks
hms-directory.author: lorien829
hms-directory.summary: In the five years since the Final Battle, Harry Potter and Ron Weasley have struggled to cope with the mysterious disappearance and apparent death of Hermione Granger. There are deeper and darker purposes at work than Harry yet realizes.

hms-directory.title: Child of the Phoenix
hms-directory.author: DZ2
hms-directory.summary: A Sirius Secret Response: When Harry thinks he's all ready to go back to Hogwarts, Sirius drops a bombshell that changes EVERYTHING! Now, in the knowledge that he's more than your average wizard, can Harry adjust to a new life, a new destiny and a new FAMILY? Harmony; Rated: Fiction T - English - Family/Fantasy - [Harry P., Hermione G.] [Phoenix/Jean G., Cyclops/Scott S.]

hms-directory.title: Boldly Going Where No Magical Has Gone Before
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Space...The final frontier. These are the voyages of the Starship Liberty and its international crew of scientists, engineers and a witch and wizard. Responding to an open invitation to take part in a historic mission to return to the moon as well as establishing a permanent colony on Mars, Harry and Hermione are thrust into a brand new experience. Astronaut training, learning new technology and leaving planet Earth for the incredible journey to the stars. Enroute to the Red Planet, the crew receives word from Earth of a gargantuan alien structure holding station within range of Pluto. The ship is redirected to investigate; what they find is beyond words.

hms-directory.title: M*A*G*I*C* 4077
hms-directory.author: Kgfinkel
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione are thrown backwards in time and space thanks to a faulty experimental portkey and land in the compound of the 4077th MASH during the Korean War of the 1950s. They'll need their wits if they're to solve the problems of how to get home while making friends, discovering family, assisting in caring for the wounded and hopefully keeping the Statute of Secrecy secure from the U.S. Army.

hms-directory.title: Harry Potter and the Flamel Battery
hms-directory.author: srowdytg
hms-directory.summary: Tony Stark ditches the cover story SHIELD gave him, and shocks two of his greatest admirers in Britain. This of course inspires them to put all their cleverness, wit and knowledge together and, with the help of their ragtag group of friends, create their most ambitious project: A fully functional Iron Man armour suit that will run on magic. Features a smart Harry, a misguided Dumbledore, and a terrifyingly authoritative Luna among other things. (MARVEL)

hms-directory.title: Harry Headlines At Glastonbury
hms-directory.author: Tyrannic_Puppy
hms-directory.summary: Since the war, Harry has taken to exploring long-forgotten places as a chance to escape his extensive and unwanted fame. But what he found in the depths of Glastonbury Tor will change not only his own life, but the future of all.

hms-directory.title: Mosaic Broken Hearts
hms-directory.author: bellairestrella
hms-directory.summary: Instead of explaining, he rushed on. 'You think of me as a slacker, someone who got by on their family name and other connections. And that's fine. I mean, it's sorta the truth. But that's not all who I am. You, though…' He flexed his hands on the steering wheel. 'You care so much about school and doing well so that no one can question you. And when they do, you show them why you deserve to be where you are.' He swallowed. 'You push yourself constantly, even when you shouldn't.' (in which Hermione and Harry, who are NOT best friends, are partnered together for a project and discover that first impressions can fool anyone - even them)

hms-directory.title: You're a Singer Harry
hms-directory.author: Myst867
hms-directory.summary: AU- Muggles attending University - Fluffy non-smut Oneshot. Hermione Granger is dedicated to her studies until her friend Luna Lovegood convinces her to go to a concert where she meets a tattooed singer named Harry Potter.

hms-directory.title: The Words Left Unspoken
hms-directory.author: funnefatale
hms-directory.summary: Harry sees right through her.

hms-directory.title: We, Alone
hms-directory.author: Continuedinterests
hms-directory.summary: Harry is a waiter trying to get away from the Dursleys as soon as possible. Hermione is heading off to Cambridge. Yet in the background of their lives, strange things keep happening and eventually they are able to compare notes. Harry senses an ever looming danger getting closer and closer, and suddenly, it's on both of their doorsteps. An AU were Voldemort comes back when Harry is six or so and he and Hermione never go to Hogwarts.

hms-directory.title: The Bookstore
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: Harry owns Hermione's favourite bookstore. AU Harmony.

hms-directory.title: Good Morning Beautiful
hms-directory.author: MrsDracoMalfoy
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter is in love with his fathers secretary, after a night at the eighth annual Ball Harry finally makes his move.

hms-directory.title: Beach Vacation
hms-directory.author: MrsDracoMalfoy
hms-directory.summary: They just can’t get enough of each other.

hms-directory.title: Subtlety Doesn't Work With Her
hms-directory.author: EreborMarkus
hms-directory.summary: Hermione's experience during her schooling years taught her that people only wanted her for her brains. This was baffling for Harry since he thought she was stunning.

hms-directory.title: Car Troubles & Diner Girls
hms-directory.author: conjuringghosts
hms-directory.summary: On the way up north to visit his parents and sisters, Harry's car breaks down. To escape the storm raging outside, he ducks into a diner. Behind the counter works Hermione Granger, home on break from school. Both of their lives are about to change forever.

hms-directory.title: On This Perfect Day
hms-directory.author: underratedum
hms-directory.summary: The one where harry’s in love, hermione’s the boss and ron’s trying not to lose a lot of money, or, harry makes a bet that he can get with hermione by july. hermione also happens to be their boss who’s a female powerhouse. ginny wants a car and ron wants 5 thousand pounds but we don’t always get what we want ...

hms-directory.title: Charitable
hms-directory.author: WinglessQuill
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger was content with her life, until Harry Potter appeared on the doorstep of her orphanage.

hms-directory.title: A Fairytale Beginning
hms-directory.author: gildedmagnolia
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione's first meeting, in which Harry has committed the worst possible infraction -- keeping Hermione from her book. Muggle AU/Library AU.

hms-directory.title: ScarBoy01 and BrainyBookworm555
hms-directory.author: sophh
hms-directory.summary: Hermione is apprehensive about her date with a man she knows only as 'ScarBoy01.' What happens when she learns that 'ScarBoy01' is really famous actor Harry Potter?

hms-directory.title: The Doctor and The Detective
hms-directory.author: Motherof4dragons
hms-directory.summary: Hermione - One bad decision would change my life forever. I couldn't have anticipated when I walked home from work that night that I'd bear witness to the murder of our city's most notorious gangster. The bad guys didn't notice me at the time, but I sure have their attention now. I've sacrificed everything with one goal in my life, to be a doctor, and to save lives. Nothing, not the criminals who walk our streets or Detective Harry Potter, the mule-headed cop determined to protect me, is going to get in my way. Harry - I took a vow to defend and serve. First, in the royal marines, and now, as a Detective for Hogsmeade PD. Women and romance have no place in a life like mine. But from the moment I laid on eyes on Dr. Hermione Granger, she's sparked every protective instinct I have. Smart, stubborn, and a little bit of a badass; I can't help it if she reminds me of myself. If I keep showing up at the same places as her, it's only to keep her safe. I don't do relationships after all. However, I'm not the only one watching her now. If she's not careful, I'm going to watch her get herself killed.

hms-directory.title: INKED
hms-directory.author: AlexandraO
hms-directory.summary: When Hermione Granger walks into Diagon Ink, Harry Potter gets much more than he bargained for. A tattoo on the heart is just as permanent as one placed on the skin.

hms-directory.title: Adult-Ed
hms-directory.author: msmerlin
hms-directory.summary: 'Names Harry.' 'Hermione.' 'It's nice to meet you—officially.' He said with that toothy smile, the corner of his eyes crinkling. 'So, Hermione, where are we going on our first date?' 'It's a date? I thought it was just dinner.' Or the one in which Hermione's so dreadful in her cooking class the cute man thinks it's adorable.

hms-directory.title: The Reunion
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter is turning forty soon, he has very little to show for his mediocre life, and when he runs into the girl that could have been at his Highschool Reunion, he has an epiphany that just maybe, it’s not too late for him. Harmony AU. Inspired by Psych – Season 3 Episode 2.

hms-directory.title: Letters and Photographs
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: Childhood best friends Harry Potter and Hermione Granger are separated when one of them moves away. They promise to write, but never do, and when they meet again in five years, they are strangers. As they attempt to rekindle their friendship, it is through their letters and photographs that their relationship flowers into something more. Muggle Harmony AU. Influenced by Life is Strange.

hms-directory.title: The Man with the Flower Tattoo
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: When becoming pregnant after a one-night stand, the only thing Hermione can remember about the father is a tattoo on the back of his neck. Muggle AU.

hms-directory.title: Impulse
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: She saw him coming out of the water and sometimes that's all it takes. Harmony AU.

hms-directory.title: Can I Kiss You?
hms-directory.author: catboyfication (orphan_account)
hms-directory.summary: Sometimes, kissing your bestfriend who's mouth tastes like burger in an empty mcdonald's parking lot is peak romance.

hms-directory.title: That's Not My Name
hms-directory.author: CelestialSeaWitch
hms-directory.summary: Cappuccinos, cupcakes, and misspelt names. Harry/Hermione coffee shop AU.

hms-directory.title: Don't Make Me Fall In Love Again If He Won't Be Here Next Year
hms-directory.author: xLoveMx
hms-directory.summary: For a moment she was stunned, because this was the last thing she had expected to see. Surely, there must have been a reason for him to come to this little town, but she hadn’t expected Harry Potter, famous wizard and high-ranking worker at the Ministry of Magic, to plan on opening a coffee shop.

hms-directory.title: The Perfect Brew
hms-directory.author: StarlingChild4
hms-directory.summary: Tea shop!AU. Muggle-verse. Harry can't help noticing the girl who comes by his parents' tea shop every day, and Hermione can't help noticing him as well. But they don't know each others' names... Yet. Shameless Harmony fluff ahead. Oneshot. [COMPLETE]

hms-directory.title: When Everything Breaks (you are the anchor that holds me)
hms-directory.author: bellairestrella
hms-directory.summary: For Hermione, it was another regular day at the library...until one library patron comes around and changes everything. (Sappy summary, but it's still fluffy, I promise).

hms-directory.title: Of Roses and Thorns
hms-directory.author: EnchantedPixie495
hms-directory.summary: Hermione wants more out of life than the small provincial town of Hogsmeade. There, she stands out from the crowd with her strong-willed independence and her love for books. But when Hermione's father was taken prisoner, her path was forever changed.

hms-directory.title: Harmony and The Memory
hms-directory.author: JacobApples
hms-directory.summary: My attempt at a romance fairytale. Beauty and the Beast, Hermione Granger and Harry Potter. Takes place several months after the Final Battle. I have never been good at writing short stories but here it goes and you'll on Fanfic .net have been teaching me how to write romance.

hms-directory.title: Ever After
hms-directory.author: SweetShireen
hms-directory.summary: 'This Cinders girl is just like you!' Dudley snickers as he watches the television. 'Dressed in rags, does all the chores, always dirty, and no one wants her. Even her parents are dead!' Later, when Harry lies in bed and stares up at the dusty cobwebs on the cupboard ceiling, he can't help but wonder wearily: 'If I'm Cinders, does that mean one day someone will come to save me too?'

hms-directory.title: A Whole New World
hms-directory.author: The Muse of Apollo (mtwb)
hms-directory.summary: Orphan Harry Potter meets a mysterious woman one day in Hogsmeade. That woman will change his life forever, and will finally allow him to know the past that has been kept from him for so long.

hms-directory.title: Lovely Lady
hms-directory.author: Frumpologist
hms-directory.summary: After the war, with no parents, no money, and a broken spirit, Hermione Granger fled to Paris with no more than her wand and a rucksack. With a Notice-Me-Not charm firmly in place, she finds friendship with another war refugee, Lavender Brown, as a professional escort on the streets of Paris. Several years pass and Hermione is faced with old comrades from the past — Harry Potter arrives in Paris on an official Ministry trip.

hms-directory.title: Ever After: A Harmony Story
hms-directory.author: LadyKenz347
hms-directory.summary: A Harmony Story based on the film Ever After. For Harmony & Co's Film Fest.

hms-directory.title: Read To Me
hms-directory.author: conjuringghosts
hms-directory.summary: Harry Potter, a merman in the Black Lake, hears a voice and makes an unlikely friend.

hms-directory.title: Abandon
hms-directory.author: Continuedinterests
hms-directory.summary: Harry's twenty two years old but feels fifty. Everyday he holds court at the ministry. Everyday the crown becomes heavier. He needs to leave and it's obvious, clear and simple, who will leave with him. Road trip romance. Friends to lovers. EWE.

hms-directory.title: The Decadence of Misspent Youth
hms-directory.author: saveourskinship
hms-directory.summary: Harry is sick of the daily Ministry grind. It's all bureaucracy and sycophantic yesmen. His roommate feels the same. So when Hermione suggests they go on a roadtrip with a side of semi-illicit activities how can Harry refuse?

hms-directory.title: Houdini
hms-directory.author: aureliandreams
hms-directory.summary: The Patronus came at lunch. In the middle of St. Mungo’s cafeteria, as she poured over the file containing her patient’s latest test results and inhaled a sandwich, the giant silver stag manifested in a swirl of the purest magic. A voice she was unbearably familiar with spoke a singular word. 'Houdini.'

hms-directory.title: Corazón De Mi Alma
hms-directory.author: nightfalltwen
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione travel to Mexico for the repatriation of a cursed Mayan artifact.

hms-directory.title: Decking The Halls With Tales of Harmony
hms-directory.author: Aeyliana
hms-directory.summary: An Advent Anthology of drabbles, short stories and vignettes for the 2022 HMS Harmony Advent Fest. 24 days, 24 prompts and (hopefully) 24 stories.

hms-directory.title: A Very Harmony Christmas
hms-directory.author: Stargon
hms-directory.summary: A Christmas-themed story collection in the lives of Harry and Hermione. Every day, starting from the 1st of December, a new prompt will be given in the HMS Harmony Discord channel. Here are my drabbles centered around the given prompts. 24 days until Christmas, 24 prompts.

hms-directory.title: Honour Harmony in Their Hearts and Try to Keep it All The Year
hms-directory.author: CrediblyDisavowed
hms-directory.summary: Written for the 2022 HMS Harmony Advent Fest - 24 days of advent. 24 prompts. 24 drabbles? With such seasonal favourites as: Tinsel Kiss, Angry Car Trip, Danger Footsie and more! Buy now with your credit card and get a 25th 24 word drabble free in the chapter titles! (Note: No purchase required. It's just a joke. Secret drabble by Charles Dickens.)

hms-directory.title: Homeward
hms-directory.author: dragonmarked
hms-directory.summary: Homeward: leading towards home. Or written for the Advent Fest in the HMS Harmony Discord. A chapter a day for 24 days until Christmas.

hms-directory.title: 24 Days of Christmas - The Harmony Collection
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: The 2022 HMS Harmony Advent Fest: a Christmas-themed event from the 1st to the 24th of December, when a new prompt will be announced on the HMS Harmony Discord every day, and a short drabble centred around the prompt will be written.

hms-directory.title: Syzygy's Festive Harmony Drabbles
hms-directory.author: Syzygy_Spirit
hms-directory.summary: My entries for this year's HMS Harmony Advent Fest. I probably won't manage to write a drabble for all 24 prompts, but we'll see. There won't be any hardcore smut or violence in here, but other than the expected ubiquity of Christmas cheer I'm aiming for a range of styles and topics. Enjoy!

hms-directory.title: Traditions
hms-directory.author: Petrificus Somewhatus
hms-directory.summary: The best traditions can spawn from the most unlikely of circumstances.

hms-directory.title: A Christmas Miracle
hms-directory.author: Chloe Parker 05
hms-directory.summary: Something happened the night Harry went to visit his parents' grave. Something that changed the course of history.

hms-directory.title: Deus ex Coemeterium - A Tale of Christmas Eve
hms-directory.author: apAidan
hms-directory.summary: Harry and Hermione have set out for Godric's Hollow, only to discover it's Christmas Eve. What might have happened if they'd discovered a bit more that silent night. A bit OOC since Harry stops and thinks about exactly how much Hermione has given up for him over the years. My apologies for the formatting of the epitaphs, couldn't make that work once it was uploaded.

hms-directory.title: It Had To Be You
author: bettertoflee
suzy_everdeen31
hms-directory.summary: 'Obviously you only have to mention us. We’ve managed to go seventeen years without shagging.'Ten years after the war has ended Harry and Hermione are both single at the same time. The two of them now spend their Friday evenings together hanging out together after their work weeks. Some careless remark from Seamus about if men and woman can really ever just be friends leads to a series of awkward, silly, smutty, mostly happy events. A loosely inspired homage to the classic Romantic Comedy 'When Harry Met Sally.'

hms-directory.title: The Greatest Thing You'll Ever Learn
hms-directory.author: articcat621
hms-directory.summary: Hermione didn't know that her world would change after visiting Godric's Hollow, the local cabaret.

hms-directory.title: Notting Hill - A Harmony Retelling
hms-directory.author: HappyCatTaxi
hms-directory.summary: The life of an ordinary bookshop owner is turned around when she meets the most famous wizard in the world. The story is a retelling of Notting Hill (1999) with Harry Potter characters.

hms-directory.title: Made of Honor
hms-directory.author: CrazyKitCat
hms-directory.summary: Always shy of commitment, Harry lives as a serial dater. His best friend, Hermione, has wanted to marry and now has found Mr. Right — just as Harry realizes he really loves her. When she asks him to be in her bridal party, Harry seizes the opportunity to destroy the wedding and woo her himself. T-rating available on Fanfiction.net

hms-directory.title: National Treasure
hms-directory.author: AlexandraO
hms-directory.summary: Treasure hunter, historian, and cryptologist, Harry Potter has been searching his whole life for a rumored treasure dating back to the time of Merlin. After an expedition in Godric’s Hollow goes haywire and one of his most trusted allies turns on him, following the law isn’t on the agenda. With the help of his trusty sidekick, Draco Malfoy, and a reluctant Dr Hermione Granger, they turn into treasure protectors, risking their lives, come hell or high water.

hms-directory.title: Dirty Dancing
hms-directory.author: Amynoelle and Heaven
hms-directory.summary: AU: When Hermione goes with her family to the Hillsdale Resort for a holiday, she doesn't expect to learn to dance. She also doesn't expect to meet and fall in love with Harry Potter... H/Hr, D/G, R/LL & more.

hms-directory.title: Witch Actually
hms-directory.author: xLoveMx
hms-directory.summary: When Hermione Granger applies to work as the secretary to the newly appointed, and very famous, Minister of Magic, Harry Potter, she gets more than she bargained for.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's Flying Delivery Service
hms-directory.author: IckleRonnikens
hms-directory.summary: Hermione Granger leaves home to become an independent witch-in-training, finds a new town to live in, sets up a delivery service, and meets a very unusual boy. Harmony AU.

hms-directory.title: Freaky Friday
hms-directory.author: damadape
hms-directory.summary: Prompt: Friday 31 October 1997. Something always happens on Halloween. Without the threat of Voldemort, he was destroyed when he attacked Hogwarts at the end of their sixth year, Harry is hoping for a quiet day. Perhaps he will make it a good memory and finally ask out the girl he likes. Too bad for the occupants of the castle as they all wake up switched with someone else! Who wakes up as who and what will they do?! Can Harry find his secret crush and still ask her out, what if they are all trapped in these new bodies?

hms-directory.title: Coming Home to You
hms-directory.author: MykEsprit
hms-directory.summary: After her tumultuous teen years, Hermione finally has she wanted: a quiet, uneventful life as a bookshop owner. But when her Muggle boyfriend proposes, she is forced to go back to confront her past... And her estranged husband, who refuses to sign their divorce papers. Based on Sweet Home Alabama Written for Harmony at the Movies Fest 2019.

hms-directory.title: Hermione's All That
hms-directory.author: jenl821
hms-directory.summary: Loosely based on the film She's All That. Harry makes a bet with Draco that he can turn any girl into the Queen at the Yule Ball. The challenge: Hermione Granger.

hms-directory.title: The Means to an End
hms-directory.author: DarthMittens
hms-directory.summary: What happens when there's a party in the Gryffindor common room and Harry accidentally drinks a truth serum developed by the Weasley twins? Weasley-bashing galore. One-shot. A touch of crude language.
